<TD WIDTH="9%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>Item&nbsp;8.01.</B></FONT></TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>Other Events. </B></FONT></TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="margin-top:6px;margin-bottom:0px;padding-bottom:3px;"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">On August&nbsp;17, 2009, in
response to a comment from the staff of the Securities and Exchange Commission (the &#147;Commission&#148;), the Company filed material agreements relating to its alliance with sanofi-aventis regarding the codevelopment and cocommercialization of
PLAVIX<FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="1"><SUP STYLE="vertical-align:baseline; position:relative; bottom:.8ex">&reg;</SUP></FONT> / ISCOVER<FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="1"><SUP
STYLE="vertical-align:baseline; position:relative; bottom:.8ex">&reg;</SUP></FONT> (clopidogrel bisulfate) and its alliance with Otsuka Pharmaceutical Co., Ltd. regarding the codevelopment and cocommercialization of ABILIFY<FONT
FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="1"><SUP STYLE="vertical-align:baseline; position:relative; bottom:.8ex">&reg;</SUP></FONT> (aripiprazole). </FONT></P> <P STYLE="font-size:18px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P>

 <BODY BGCOLOR="WHITE">

 <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="right"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>Exhibit 10.1 </B></FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT
FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><I>This text is a free translation from the French language and is supplied solely for information purposes. </I></FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman"
SIZE="2"><I>Only the original version in the French language has legal force. </I></FONT></P> <P STYLE="font-size:12px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P> <P STYLE="font-size:12px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P> <P
STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>SANOFI PHARMA BRISTOL-MYERS SQUIBB </B></FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman"
SIZE="2">Commercial partnership with capital of 50,000 francs </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">Headquarters: 32-34, rue Marbeuf, 75008 Paris, France </FONT></P> <P
STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">Register of Commerce and Companies of Paris B 408 017 929 </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT
FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B><U>BYLAWS </U></B></FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">Updated June&nbsp;6, 1997 </FONT></P>

 <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><I>This text is a free translation from the French language and is supplied solely for information
purposes. </I></FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><I>Only the original version in the French language has legal force. </I></FONT></P> <P
STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
 <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>BETWEEN THE UNDERSIGNED: </B></FONT></P> <P STYLE="font-size:6px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">1.</FONT></TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">Sanofi Participations, a corporation with capital of 250,000 francs headquartered at 32-34, rue Marbeuf, 75008 Paris, France, recorded with the Register of Commerce and Companies of
Paris under number B 407 571 725 (&#147;<U>Partner Sanofi</U>&#148;), a subsidiary indirectly held wholly by Sanofi, a corporation with capital of 2,624,217,125 francs headquartered at 32-34 rue Marbeuf, 75008 Paris, France, recorded with the
Register of Commerce and Companies of Paris under number B 732 059 332 (&#147;<U>Sanofi</U>&#148;), and </FONT></TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="font-size:6px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">2.</FONT></TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">BMS Investco S.A.S., a simplified corporation with capital of 250,000 francs, headquartered at 1, Parvis de la Defense, La Grande Arche Nord, 92800 Puteaux, recorded with the
Register of Commerce and Companies of Nanterre under number B 407 846 195 (&#147;<U>Partner BMS</U>&#148;), a subsidiary directly and indirectly held wholly by Bristol-Myers Squibb Company, a company of the State of Delaware (United States of
America) headquartered at 345 Park Avenue, New York, New York 10022 (&#147;<U>BMS</U>&#148;). </FONT></TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="margin-top:18px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B><U>ARTICLE 1 &#150; CORPORATE FORM </U></B>
</FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:6px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">The Partners form a commercial partnership (the &#147;<U>Company</U>&#148;) governed by the Bylaws and by law No.&nbsp;66-537 of
July&nbsp;24, 1996 and decree No.&nbsp;67-236 of March&nbsp;23, 1967, and by any other legal or regulatory provisions in force. The form of the Company may be modified by a unanimous decision of the Partners; <I>it being understood </I>that such
modification will not lead to the creation of a new legal person. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:18px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B><U>ARTICLE 2 &#150; CORPORATE NAME </U></B></FONT></P> <P
STYLE="margin-top:6px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">The corporate name of the Company is: SANOFI PHARMA BRISTOL-MYERS SQUIBB. The name must be preceded or immediately followed by the words &#147;commercial
partnership&#148; or the initials &#147;SNC&#148; in all acts and documents issued by the Company and intended for third parties. The activity of the Company may be conducted under any other corporate name determined in writing by the Partners in
accordance with applicable laws. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:18px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B><U>ARTICLE 3 &#150; CORPORATE PURPOSE </U></B></FONT></P> <P
STYLE="margin-top:6px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">The purpose of the Company will be (a)&nbsp;to conduct all activities related to the development, manufacture and marketing of Products in Territory A and
(b)&nbsp;to conclude, make and execute all contracts and other commitments and engage in all activities that may be necessary or desirable in order to pursue its corporate purpose. </FONT></P>

<p Style='page-break-before:always'>
<HR  SIZE="3" COLOR="#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">


 <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><I>This text is a free translation from the French language and is supplied solely for information
purposes. </I></FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><I>Only the original version in the French language has legal force. </I></FONT></P> <P
STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P>

 <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="right"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">2 </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
 <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B><U>ARTICLE 4 &#150; HEADQUARTERS </U></B></FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:6px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT
FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">The headquarters of the Company is located at 32-34, rue Marbeuf, 75008 Paris, France. The headquarters may be transferred to another place in the same department or in a neighboring department by a simple decision of
the Manager(s), <I>it being understood, however</I>, that the headquarters cannot be transferred to any other place without the unanimous agreement of the Partners. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:18px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT
FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B><U>ARTICLE 5 &#150; TERM </U></B></FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:6px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">The term of the Company is 99 years from June&nbsp;6, 1997, barring
early or anticipated dissolution or extension decided upon by the Partners at the latest 24 months before its expiration. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:18px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B><U>ARTICLE 6 &#150;
DEFINITIONS </U></B></FONT></P> <P STYLE="font-size:6px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>6.1</B></FONT></TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B><U>Terms Defined</U>.</B> When used in the Bylaws, the following terms will have the meaning indicated: </FONT></TD></TR></TABLE> <P
STYLE="margin-top:6px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:5%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">&#147;<U>Partners</U>&#148; means Partner Sanofi and Partner BMS and each of their successors and assignees; <I>with the understanding, however, </I>that
any Partner who has no participation will be presumed to have withdrawn from the Company as a Partner. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:6px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:5%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">&#147;<U>Clopidogrel</U>&#148; means
the new chemical molecule discovered and patented by Sanofi and known under the code SR 25990C whose unregistered international name is Clopidogrel Hydrogenosulphate. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:6px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:5%"><FONT
FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">&#147;<U>Irbesartan</U>&#148; means the new chemical molecule discovered and patented by Sanofi known under the code SR 47436 whose unregistered international name is Irbesartan. </FONT></P> <P
STYLE="margin-top:6px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:5%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">&#147;<U>Person</U>&#148; means any individual, <I>partnership</I>, company, including an association or commercial association, joint venture,
association, trust or any other entity or any government, agency, or their political subdivisions as well as any syndicate or group presumed to be a person under Section&nbsp;13(d) of the <I>US Securities and Exchange Act </I>of 1934 as amended.
</FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:6px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:5%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">&#147;<U>Product</U>&#148; means a Clopidogrel Product or an Irbesartan Product and &#147;<U>Products</U>&#148; means a Clopidogrel Product
and an Irbesartan Product. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:6px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:5%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">&#147;<U>Clopidogrel Product</U>&#148; means the product or products whose active principle is Clopidogrel or
any salt, ester, metabolite or <I>pro-drug</I> thereof. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:6px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:5%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">&#147;<U>Irbesartan Product</U>&#148; means the product or products whose active
principle is Irbesartan or any salt, ester, metabolite or <I>pro-drug</I> thereof. </FONT></P>

<p Style='page-break-before:always'>
<HR  SIZE="3" COLOR="#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">

purposes. </I></FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><I>Only the original version in the French language has legal force. </I></FONT></P> <P
STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P>

 <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="right"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">3 </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
 <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">&#147;<U>Subsidiary</U>&#148;, referring to a Person, means any other Person who controls, is controlled or is under
common control with such Person; <I>however, it is understood </I>that concerning Sanofi, the definition of Subsidiary excluded Elf Aquitaine and any person not controlled by Sanofi which would be a Subsidiary of Sanofi by the mere fact of its being
controlled by Elf Aquitaine. For the purposes of this definition &#147;<U>control</U>&#148; means (a)&nbsp;the direct or indirect power to guide the management of a Person or to veto any significant decision related to the management of a Person, in
each of these cases, be it by exercising voting rights, by contract or by any other means, (b)&nbsp;direct or indirect possession of holdings (excluding shares in a partnership) representing at least 40% of the voting rights of a Person or
(c)&nbsp;possession of at least 50% of the shares of an association. The Partners confirm that each Co-Promotion Entity of Territory A must be considered a Subsidiary of Sanofi. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT
FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">&#147;<U>Bylaws</U>&#148; means these bylaws, as amended, if applicable. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">&#147;<U>Territory A</U>&#148; means the
countries and geographic zones described in Annex 1.1. enclosed herewith. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="font-size:12px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P>

</TABLE> <P STYLE="margin-top:18px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B><U>ARTICLE 7 &#150; CONTRIBUTIONS &#150; HOLDINGS </U></B></FONT></P> <P
STYLE="font-size:6px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>7.1</B></FONT></TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B><U>Initial Capital Contributions</U>.</B> Upon the registration of the Company on July&nbsp;10, 1996, Partner BMS and Partner Sanofi made a cash contribution, respectively, of
24,950 francs and 25,050 francs. </FONT></TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="font-size:6px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>7.2</B></FONT></TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"> <P ALIGN="left"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B><U>Holdings: Capital</U>.</B> The holding of Partner Sanofi is 50.1<I>% </I>and the holding of Partner BMS is 49.9%. The aforementioned contributions indicate
that the Capital of the Company is 50,000 francs, allocated to </FONT>
</P></TD></TR></TABLE>

<p Style='page-break-before:always'>
<HR  SIZE="3" COLOR="#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">


 <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><I>This text is a free translation from the French language and is supplied solely for information
purposes. </I></FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><I>Only the original version in the French language has legal force. </I></FONT></P> <P
STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P>

 <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="right"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">4 </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P>

<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"> <P>
<FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">each Partner according to its holding. It is divided into 50,000 shares with a par value of 1 franc each allocated to each Partner according to its
contribution, i.e.: </FONT></P></TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:5%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">- 25,050 shares for Partner Sanofi, </FONT></P> <P
STYLE="margin-top:6px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:5%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">- 24,950 shares for Partner BMS. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="font-size:6px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>7.3</B></FONT></TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B><U>Capital Increase</U>.</B> The capital may be increased by a decision of the Partners made in Partners&#146; Meeting at the proposal of the Manager(s).
</FONT></TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="margin-top:18px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B><U>ARTICLE 8 REPRESENTATION OF THE SHARES &#150; INDIVISIBILITY &#150; RIGHTS AND OBLIGATIONS OF THE PARTNERS </U></B></FONT></P> <P
STYLE="font-size:6px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>8.1</B></FONT></TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B><U>Representation of the shares</U>.</B> The shares cannot be represented by negotiable certificates. </FONT></TD></TR></TABLE> <P
STYLE="font-size:6px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>8.2</B></FONT></TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B><U>Indivisibility of the shares</U>.</B> The shares are indivisibles concerning the Company which acknowledges only one owner for each of them. </FONT></TD></TR></TABLE> <P
STYLE="font-size:6px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>8.3</B></FONT></TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B><U>Rights and obligations of the Partners</U>, </B>Each Partner has a proportional right to its holding in the capital of the Company, in the profits of the Company and all the
assets. Each Partner responds indefinitely and jointly for the corporate debts. However, in the relations between them, each of the Partners responds for the corporate debts only in proportion to its holding in the capital. </FONT></TD></TR></TABLE>
<P STYLE="margin-top:18px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B><U>ARTICLE 9 DISTRIBUTIONS TO THE PARTNERS </U></B></FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:6px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:5%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman"
SIZE="2">The Partners may, upon proposal of the Manager(s), distribute the distributable profits and decide on the distribution of amounts taken from the reserves available when these amounts are not necessary for the continued operation of the
Company. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:18px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B><U>ARTICLE 10 &#150; ACCOUNTING &#150; AUDITORS &#150; CORPORATE ACCOUNTS &#150; APPROVAL OF THE ANNUAL ACCOUNTS </U></B></FONT></P> <P
STYLE="font-size:6px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>10.1</B></FONT></TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B><U>Books and Records</U>.</B> At any time during the term hereof, the Manager(s), at the expense of the Company, will keep (i)&nbsp;accounting books and records to reflect
accurately and fairly, with reasonable detail, all issues relating to the Company, including, without limitation, all income, expenses, assets and liabilities and (ii)&nbsp;an adequate system of internal control of the accounts. The accounts of the
Company will be held in accordance with the French accounting plan and reprocessed in accordance with the U.S. GAAP. The Company will not maintain its accounts for a period exceeding ten years (except for records to be kept for a longer period under
the law). </FONT></TD></TR></TABLE>

<p Style='page-break-before:always'>
<HR  SIZE="3" COLOR="#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">


 <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><I>This text is a free translation from the French language and is supplied solely for information
purposes. </I></FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><I>Only the original version in the French language has legal force. </I></FONT></P> <P
STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P>

 <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="right"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">5 </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P>

<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>10.2</B></FONT></TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B><U>Place and Right of Inspection</U>.</B> The books and records of the Company will be kept and maintained at all times in France, in one or more locations approved by the
Manager(s). Each Partner and its authorized representatives will have the right to inspect, examine, copy and audit the books, registers, records, securities and other documents of the Company at any reasonable time, for any purpose reasonably
related to the holding of such Partner. The Company does not charge a Partner for any inspection, review, copy or audit other than the current costs of the Company caused by them. </FONT></TD></TR></TABLE> <P
STYLE="font-size:6px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>10.3</B></FONT></TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B><U>Fiscal Year</U>.</B> The fiscal year of the Company (&#147;<U>Fiscal Year</U>&#148;) will start on January&nbsp;1 and end on December&nbsp;31 of each year.
</FONT></TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="font-size:6px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>10.4</B></FONT></TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B><U>Auditors</U>.</B> The Partners may or must, if they are forced by law, appoint one or more auditors from one or several internationally renowned audit companies selected by
the Manager(s). Each auditor will be appointed for a period of six (6)&nbsp;Fiscal Years expiring at the close of the Partners&#146; Meeting held to review the accounts of the sixth Fiscal Year. </FONT></TD></TR></TABLE> <P
STYLE="font-size:6px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>10.5</B></FONT></TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B><U>Financial Statements</U>.</B> The Manager(s) will draw up, in accordance with applicable laws and regulations, an inventory and the financial statements of the Company
(balance sheet, income statement and annex) and a written management report to be submitted for approval at the Partners&#146; Meeting within six (6)&nbsp;months after the close of each of the Fiscal Years (the &#147;<U>Partners&#146;
Meeting</U>&#148;). The financial statements, management report and the text of the resolutions submitted to the Partners&#146; Meeting will be sent to the Partners at least fifteen (15)&nbsp;days before the Partners&#146; Meeting. During the same
period, the inventory will be made available to the Partners at the headquarters of the Company. </FONT></TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="font-size:6px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>10.6</B></FONT></TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B><U>Bank Accounts and Investment</U>.</B> The funds of the Company will be deposited into an account or accounts in one or more French banks selected by the Manager(s).
Withdrawals will be made by persons designated by the Partners. The funds of the Company whose disbursement is not provided will be invested by the Manager(s) in accordance with and under the guidance of the Partners. </FONT></TD></TR></TABLE> <P
STYLE="margin-top:18px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B><U>ARTICLE 11 &#150; MANAGEMENT OF THE COMPANY </U></B></FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:6px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:5%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman"
SIZE="2">(a) The Company will be managed and administered by one or more Managers appointed by the Partners among candidates nominated by Partner Sanofi and chosen among the Subsidiaries of Sanofi, and in regard to the head pharmacist Manager only
among employees and/or officers of Sanofi. The term &#147;<U>Manager</U>&#148; and &#147;<U>Managers</U>&#148; as used in these bylaws means individuals and legal persons, if applicable, Partners or not, appointed under this article 11.1.
</FONT></P>

<p Style='page-break-before:always'>
<HR  SIZE="3" COLOR="#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">


 <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><I>This text is a free translation from the French language and is supplied solely for information
purposes. </I></FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><I>Only the original version in the French language has legal force. </I></FONT></P> <P
STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P>

 <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="right"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">6 </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P>

<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">(b)</FONT></TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">If the activities of the Company require the appointment of a head pharmacist, the Partners will designate a Manager, natural person, who will be the head pharmacist of the Company
and will have only the necessary powers to make decisions to substantially meet the applicable regulations. </FONT></TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="font-size:6px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">(c)</FONT></TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">The Manager(s) will be responsible for the daily management of the Company. In relations with third parties, the Manager(s) will have the power to execute all management acts within
the corporate purpose of the Company as defined in article 3 hereof. </FONT></TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="font-size:6px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">(d)</FONT></TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">Each Manager will be appointed for a renewable term of one year. The dismissal or resignation of a Manager will not cause the dissolution of the Company. </FONT></TD></TR></TABLE>
<P STYLE="margin-top:18px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B><U>ARTICLE 12 DECISIONS OF THE PARTNERS </U></B></FONT></P> <P STYLE="font-size:6px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>12.1</B></FONT></TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B><U>General Meeting</U>.</B> The will of the Partners is expressed by the collective decisions made in General Meeting (hereinafter referred to as the &#147;<U>General
Meeting</U>&#148;). Unless otherwise specified in the law on companies or these bylaws, these decisions will be valid if adopted by simple majority. In addition, except for those relating to the approval of the annual accounts which must be made in
General Meeting, all other decisions may be validly made by written consultation of the Partners. </FONT></TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="font-size:6px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>12.2</B></FONT></TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B><U>Amendments of Bylaws</U>.</B> Unless expressly set forth otherwise in the Bylaws, any amendment of the Bylaws may be made only by the General Meeting deciding unanimously.
</FONT></TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="font-size:6px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>12.3</B></FONT></TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B><U>Invitation</U>. </B>The General Meeting is called by the Manager(s) by registered letter with acknowledgement of receipt, sent at least 15 business days before the meeting to
each of the Partners and containing the indication of the day, time and place and the agenda of the meeting. It may be called under the same conditions by any Partner. It is validly held upon verbal invitation if all Partners are present or legally
represented. </FONT></TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="margin-top:18px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B><U>ARTICLE 13 &#150; TRANSFERS OF SHARES </U></B></FONT></P> <P
STYLE="font-size:6px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>13.1</B></FONT></TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B><U>No Transfer</U></B><B>.</B> No share of the Company may be sold, assigned, transferred, pledged or encumbered with surety, in full or in part, directly or indirectly, by
operation of law or otherwise (including, without limitation thereto, by merger or distribution) (any such sale, assignment, transfer, pledge or surety being hereinafter referred to as a &#147;<U>Transfer</U>&#148;), without the prior unanimous
agreement of the Partners (which will not be unreasonably withheld). Unless otherwise agreed by the Partners, any Transfer of any proposed holding in violation of this article 13 will be null and void. </FONT></TD></TR></TABLE>

<p Style='page-break-before:always'>
<HR  SIZE="3" COLOR="#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">


 <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><I>This text is a free translation from the French language and is supplied solely for information
purposes. </I></FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><I>Only the original version in the French language has legal force. </I></FONT></P> <P
STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P>

 <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="right"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">7 </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P>

<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>13.2</B></FONT></TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B><U>New Partners</U>.</B> No Person will become Partner within the meaning and under the terms hereof unless such Person is ready to expressly assume and agree to be bound by all
stipulations of the Bylaws. All costs and expenses reasonably incurred by the Company and related to a Transfer and, if applicable, for the admission of a Person as Partner following these bylaws will be paid by the transferor.
</FONT></TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="font-size:6px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>13.3</B></FONT></TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B><U>Effective Date of the Transfer</U></B><B>.</B> Any Transfer under this article 13 will be made in writing and will be enforceable against the Company only after notification
to it or after its acceptance by notarized document under the conditions set forth in article 1690 of the Civil Code. Such Transfer will be effective against third parties only after application of the procedures required by applicable law and
registration of such Transfer in the Register of Commerce and Companies with jurisdiction. </FONT></TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="margin-top:18px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B><U>ARTICLE 14 &#150; DISSOLUTION
</U></B></FONT></P> <P STYLE="font-size:6px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>14.1</B></FONT></TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B><U>Dissolution</U>.</B> The Company will be dissolved and its business liquidated in the event of the first of the following events: </FONT></TD></TR></TABLE> <P
STYLE="font-size:6px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD WIDTH="5%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">(i)</FONT></TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">written agreement of each of the Partners to dissolve the Company; </FONT></TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="font-size:6px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD WIDTH="5%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">(ii)</FONT></TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">suspension of the marketing of any Products for safety problems; and </FONT></TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="font-size:6px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD WIDTH="5%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">(iii)</FONT></TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">expiration of the term of the Company in accordance with article 5 hereof. </FONT></TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="font-size:6px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>14.2</B></FONT></TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B><U>Effects of the Dissolution</U>. </B>In all cases of dissolution of the Company, the business of the Company will be completed and the Company will be dissolved as soon as
practicable thereafter and the following operations will be carried out: </FONT></TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="margin-top:6px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:5%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">(a) the liquidator appointed by Partner Sanofi will
prepare a report outlining the remaining assets and liabilities of the Company at the date of dissolution, a copy of which must be delivered to each Partner; </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:6px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:5%"><FONT
FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">(b) the net proceeds of the liquidation, after covering corporate liabilities and charges, are used to reimburse the accounts of the Partners, if any, and the amount of their rights in the capital; and </FONT></P> <P
STYLE="margin-top:6px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:5%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">(c) the balance, if any, constituting the liquidation surplus and distributed between the Partners in proportion to their holding in the Company and, if
the results show liquidation losses, they will be borne by the Partners in the same proportion. </FONT></P>

<p Style='page-break-before:always'>
<HR  SIZE="3" COLOR="#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">


 <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><I>This text is a free translation from the French language and is supplied solely for information
purposes. </I></FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><I>Only the original version in the French language has legal force. </I></FONT></P> <P
STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P>

 <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="right"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">8 </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P>

<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>14.3</B></FONT></TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B><U>Liquidating Partner</U>.</B> Partner Sanofi will designate the liquidator. </FONT></TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="margin-top:18px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman"
SIZE="2"><B><U>ARTICLE 15 &#150; MISCELLANEOUS </U></B></FONT></P> <P STYLE="font-size:6px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>15.1</B></FONT></TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B><U>Tax Status.</U></B> The Company will not opt for its liability to tax on companies. </FONT></TD></TR></TABLE> <P
STYLE="font-size:6px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>15.2</B></FONT></TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B><U>Disputes</U>. </B>All the disputes among the partners which arise from the present bylaws will be definitively adjudicated following the regulation of the International
Chamber of Commerce by three (3)&nbsp;arbitrators named in accordance with this regulation. The arbitration procedure will be conducted in English in Paris, France. The president of the arbitral tribunal will be neither a citizen of the United
States of America nor of France. </FONT></TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="font-size:6px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>15.3</B></FONT></TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B><U>Publications</U>.</B> All powers are given by the partners to the bearer of an original copy of the present bylaws in order to carry out all the formalities of publication
that will be necessary. </FONT></TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="font-size:6px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>15.4</B></FONT></TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B><U>Internal Regulation</U>.</B> The bylaws will be, by mutual agreement among the partners, completed and made explicit by an interior regulation. </FONT></TD></TR></TABLE> <P
STYLE="margin-top:6px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:5%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">Signed in Canne, France, on June&nbsp;6, 1997. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="font-size:12px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P><DIV ALIGN="right">

STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:1.00em; text-indent:-1.00em"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">Former&nbsp;Yugoslavia (including Bosnia and Herzegovina, Croatia, Macedonia, Montenegro, Serbia and Slovenia)</FONT></P> <P
STYLE="font-size:18px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B><U>Africa</U>:</B></FONT></P> <P
STYLE="font-size:6px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">Algeria</FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman"
SIZE="2">Angola</FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">Benin</FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">Botswana</FONT></P> <P

<TD WIDTH="2%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"></FONT><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="1"><SUP STYLE="vertical-align:baseline; position:relative; bottom:.8ex">1</SUP></FONT><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">
</FONT></TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"> <P ALIGN="left"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">Territory A is considered to include any new territory created by division, consolidation or change in the name of the countries listed below.

purposes. </I></FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><I>Only the original version in the French language has legal force. </I></FONT></P> <P
STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P>

 <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="right"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">2 </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P>

<TABLE CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" WIDTH="100%" BORDER="0" ALIGN="center">

<TR>
<TD WIDTH="50%"></TD>
<TD VALIGN="bottom" WIDTH="2%"></TD>
<TD WIDTH="48%"></TD></TR>
<TR>

<p Style='page-break-before:always'>
<HR  SIZE="3" COLOR="#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">


 <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><I>This text is a free translation from the French language and is supplied solely for information
purposes. </I></FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><I>Only the original version in the French language has legal force. </I></FONT></P> <P
STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
 <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">BETWEEN THE UNDERSIGNED: </FONT></P> <P STYLE="font-size:6px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">1.</FONT></TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">Sanofi Participations, a corporation with capital of 250,000 francs headquartered at 32-34 rue Marbeuf, 75008 Paris, France, recorded with the Register of Commerce and Companies of
Paris under number B 407 571 725 (&#147;<U>Partner Sanofi</U>&#148;), a subsidiary indirectly held wholly by Sanofi; a corporation with capital of 2,624,217,125 francs headquartered at 32-34 rue Marbeuf, 75008 Paris, France, recorded with the
Register of Commerce and Companies of Paris under number B 732 059 332 (&#147;<U>Sanofi</U>&#148;), and </FONT></TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="font-size:6px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">2.</FONT></TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">BMS Investco S.A.S., a simplified corporation with capital of 250,000 francs, headquartered at 1, Parvis de la Defense, La Grande Arche Nord, 92800 Puteaux, recorded with the
Register of Commerce and Companies of Nanterre under number B 407 846 195 (&#147;<U>Partner BMS</U>&#148;), a subsidiary directly and indirectly held wholly by Bristol-Myers Squibb Company, a company of the State of Delaware (United States of
America) headquartered at 345 Park Avenue, New York, New York 10022 (&#147;<U>BMS</U>&#148;). </FONT></TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="margin-top:24px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B><U>RECITALS</U>
</B></FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">The Partners constituted between them the commercial partnership Sanofi Pharma Bristol-Myers Squibb (the &#147;<U>Company</U>&#148;).
</FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">As part of an operation intended for the joint development and marketing, by the two Partners of the Company, of pharmaceutical products
obtained from two new molecules Irbesartan and Clopidogrel, which were discovered and patented by Sanofi and developed by BMS, the Partners completely amended the Bylaws of the Company in order to allow for the performance of this new activity.
</FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">The Partners decided by mutual consent, under the terms of article 15.4 of the Bylaws of the Company, to issue this internal regulation
whose object is to complete and explain the Bylaws (hereinafter the &#147;<U>Internal Regulation</U>&#148;). </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:18px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B><U>ARTICLE 1 &#150; DEFINITIONS </U></B>
</FONT></P> <P STYLE="font-size:6px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>1.1</B></FONT></TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B><U>Terms Defined</U>.</B> When used in the Internal Regulation, the following terms will have the meaning indicated: </FONT></TD></TR></TABLE> <P
STYLE="margin-top:6px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:5%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">&#147;<U>Territory A Framework Agreement</U>&#148; means the Territory A Framework Agreement between BMS, Sanofi and Sterling dated July&nbsp;29, 1993 for
the marketing of the Products in Territory A. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
 <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">* CONFIDENTIAL TREATMENT REQUESTED. CONFIDENTIAL PORTION HAS BEEN FILED SEPARATELY WITH THE SECURITIES AND EXCHANGE
COMMISSION </FONT></P>


<p Style='page-break-before:always'>
<HR  SIZE="3" COLOR="#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">


 <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><I>This text is a free translation from the French language and is supplied solely for information
purposes. </I></FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><I>Only the original version in the French language has legal force. </I></FONT></P> <P
STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P>

 <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="right"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">2 </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
 <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:5%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">&#147;<U>Puerto Rico Purchase and Sale Agreement</U>&#148; means the Purchase and Sale Agreement to be
executed between the Company and the Subsidiary (Subsidiaries) of BMS for the sale of the chemically active substances to such Subsidiary (Subsidiaries) and the purchase of finished packaged products from such Subsidiary (Subsidiaries). </FONT></P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:6px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:5%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">&#147;<U>Development Agreement</U>&#148; means the Development Agreement between BMS, Sanofi and Sterling dated July&nbsp;29, 1993. </FONT></P> <P
STYLE="margin-top:6px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:5%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">&#147;<U>Supply Agreement for Irbesartan</U>&#148; means the Supply Agreement for Irbesartan to be executed between the Company, Bristol-Myers Squibb
Sanofi Pharmaceuticals Holding Partnership, a <I>partnership</I> of the State of Delaware, BMS and Sanofi for the supply of the chemically active substances of Irbesartan. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:6px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:5%"><FONT
FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">&#147;<U>License and Supply Agreement for Clopidogrel</U>&#148; means the License Agreement of Intellectual Property and Supply of Clopidogrel dated today between the Company and Sanofi concerning the license of
certain patents, trademarks and know-how for Clopidogrel and the Clopidogrel Products of Sanofi to the Company and the supply of the chemically active substances of Clopidogrel in exchange for payment to Sanofi of the Royalty for Discovery and
Payment of the Supply (as such terms are defined therein). </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:6px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:5%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">&#147;<U>Know-How License Agreement</U>&#148; means the Know-How License
Agreement of the Product dated today between the Company, Sanofi and BMS concerning the license of the know-how developed by Sanofi and BMS pursuant to the Development Agreement, the use of corporate names by the Company and the development of
Irbesartan and Clopidogrel as of the date hereof in exchange for the payment of the Royalty for Discovery (as the term is defined therein). </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:6px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:5%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman"
SIZE="2">&#147;<U>License Agreement for Irbesartan</U>&#148; means the License Agreement of Intellectual Property dated today between the Company and Sanofi concerning the license of certain patents, trademarks and know-how for Irbesartan and the
Irbesartan Products of Sanofi to the Company in exchange for the payment to Sanofi of the Royalty for Discovery (as this term is defined therein). </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:6px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:5%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman"
SIZE="2">&#147;<U>Toll Manufacturing Agreements</U>&#148; means (i)&nbsp;the Toll Manufacturing Irbesartan Agreement to be executed for the production of chemically active substances of Irbesartan into finished, packaged Irbesartan Products, if
applicable and (ii)&nbsp;the Toll Manufacturing Clopidogrel Agreement to be executed for the production of Clopidogrel chemically active substances into finished, packaged Clopidogrel Products, if applicable. </FONT></P> <P
STYLE="margin-top:6px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:5%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">&#147;<I><U>Alliance Support Agreement</U></I>&#148; means the Alliance Support Agreement of Territory A between Sanofi and BMS dated as of today.
</FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
 <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">* CONFIDENTIAL TREATMENT REQUESTED. CONFIDENTIAL PORTION HAS BEEN FILED SEPARATELY WITH THE SECURITIES AND EXCHANGE
COMMISSION </FONT></P>


<p Style='page-break-before:always'>
<HR  SIZE="3" COLOR="#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">


 <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><I>This text is a free translation from the French language and is supplied solely for information
purposes. </I></FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><I>Only the original version in the French language has legal force. </I></FONT></P> <P
STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P>

 <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="right"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">3 </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
 <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:5%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">&#147;<U>Partners</U>&#148; means Partner Sanofi and Partner BMS and each of their successors and
assignees; <I>with the understanding, however, </I>that any Partner who has no participation will be presumed to have withdrawn from the company as a Partner. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:6px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:5%"><FONT
FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">&#147;<U>Government Authority</U>&#148; means any state, administrative, or judicial, local, national, or supra-national authority. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:6px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:5%"><FONT
FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">&#147;<U>Clopidogrel</U>&#148; means the new chemical molecule discovered and patented by Sanofi and known under the code SR 25990C whose unregistered international name is Clopidogrel Hydrogenosulphate. </FONT></P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:6px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:5%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">&#147;<U>Co-Marketing</U>&#148; means for each Product and for each country of Territory A, the marketing of this Product in this country under two or
several trademarks by the Marketing Entities concerned. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:6px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:5%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">&#147;<U>Finance Committee</U>&#148; has the meaning given in the <I>Alliance
Support Agreement</I>. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:6px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:5%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">&#147;<U>License Steering Committee</U>&#148; has the meaning presented in the Know-How License Agreement.
</FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:6px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:5%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">&#147;<U>Functional Committees</U>&#148; means the Functional Committees of the Alliance (as defined in the <I>Alliance Support
Agreement</I>) and the Functional License Committees (as defined in the Know-How License Agreement). </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:6px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:5%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">&#147;<U>Strategic Alliance
Committee</U>&#148; has the meaning given in the <I>Alliance Support Agreement</I>. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:6px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:5%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">&#147;<U>Co-Promotion</U>&#148; means, for each product
and for each country of Territory A, the marketing of this Product in this country under a single trademark by the Marketing Entity concerned. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:6px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:5%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman"
SIZE="2">&#147;<U>Application for New Drug</U>&#148; means the application to be filed with the competent government authority in any country in order to obtain marketing authorization for a new drug in that country. </FONT></P> <P
STYLE="margin-top:6px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:5%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">&#147;<U>Elf Aquitaine</U>&#148; means Soci&eacute;t&eacute; Nationale Elf Aquitaine, a corporation under French law. </FONT></P> <P
STYLE="margin-top:6px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:5%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">&#147;<U>Adverse Events</U>&#148; means any negative symptom experienced while or after taking a Product, known to one of the Partners or one of its
Subsidiaries, whether or not considered to be triggered by a drug, including without limitation thereto any side effect, injury, poisoning or allergic reaction, or significant failure of an expected pharmacological action, and symptomatic overdose
case, or reactions of abuse or withdrawal. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
 <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">* CONFIDENTIAL TREATMENT REQUESTED. CONFIDENTIAL PORTION HAS BEEN FILED SEPARATELY WITH THE SECURITIES AND EXCHANGE
COMMISSION </FONT></P>


<p Style='page-break-before:always'>

 <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><I>This text is a free translation from the French language and is supplied solely for information
purposes. </I></FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><I>Only the original version in the French language has legal force. </I></FONT></P> <P
STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P>

 <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="right"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">4 </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
 <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:5%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">&#147;<U>Serious Adverse Events</U>&#148; means any Side Effect endangering life to the extent that such
Side Effect exposes the patient to a deadly risk requiring or extending hospitalization or causing permanent disability, birth defect, cancer or death. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:6px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:5%"><FONT
FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">&#147;<U>Marketing Work Group</U>&#148; has the meaning presented in the Know-How License Agreement. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:6px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:5%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman"
SIZE="2">&#147;<U>Irbesartan</U>&#148; means the new chemical molecule discovered and patented by Sanofi known under the code SR 47436 whose unregistered international name is Irbesartan. </FONT></P> <P
STYLE="margin-top:6px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:5%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">&#147;<U>Non-Promotional Countries</U>&#148; means the countries in Territory A where the use of the individual promotion by sales personnel is not a
significant factor in order to achieve the consumption of the product or make sales, or in which sales are made by tender or by a comparable non-promotional sales method, as determined from time to time by the Finance Committee. </FONT></P> <P
STYLE="margin-top:6px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:5%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">&#147;<U>Person</U>&#148; means any individual, <I>partnership</I>, company, including an association or commercial association, joint venture,
association, trust or any other entity or any government, agency, or their political subdivisions as well as any syndicate or group presumed to be a person under Section&nbsp;13(d) of the <I>US Securities and Exchange Act </I>of 1934 as amended.
</FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:6px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:5%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><I></I>&#147;<U>Safety Problem</U>&#148; as well as the reference to the &#147;safety problem&#148; in article 14.1 of the Bylaws, has the
meaning presented in the <I>Alliance Support Agreement. </I></FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:6px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:5%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">&#147;<U>Product</U>&#148; means a Clopidogrel Product or an Irbesartan Product
and &#147;<U>Products</U>&#148; means a Clopidogrel Product and an Irbesartan Product. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:6px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:5%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">&#147;<U>Clopidogrel Product</U>&#148; means the
product or products whose active principle is Clopidogrel or any salt, ester, metabolite or <I>pro-drug</I> thereof. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:6px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:5%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">&#147;<U>Irbesartan
Product</U>&#148; means the product or products whose active principle is Irbesartan or any salt, ester, metabolite or <I>pro-drug</I> thereof. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:6px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:5%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman"
SIZE="2">&#147;<U>Subsidiary</U>&#148;, referring to a Person, means any other Person who controls, is controlled or is under common control with such Person; <I>however, it is understood </I>that concerning Sanofi, the definition of Subsidiary
excludes Elf Aquitaine and any person not controlled by Sanofi which would be a Subsidiary of Sanofi by the mere fact of its being controlled by Elf Aquitaine. For the purposes of this definition &#147;<U>control</U>&#148; means (a)&nbsp;the direct
or indirect power to guide the management of a Person or to veto any significant decision related to the management of a Person, in each of these cases, be it by exercising voting rights, by contract or by any other means, (b)&nbsp;direct or
indirect possession of holdings </FONT>
</P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
 <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">* CONFIDENTIAL TREATMENT REQUESTED. CONFIDENTIAL PORTION HAS BEEN FILED SEPARATELY WITH THE SECURITIES AND EXCHANGE
COMMISSION </FONT></P>

 <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:5%">
<FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">(excluding shares in a partnership) representing at least 40% of the voting rights of a Person or (c)&nbsp;possession of at least 50% of the shares of an
association. The Partners confirm that each Co-Promotion Entity of Territory A must be considered a Subsidiary of Sanofi. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:6px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:5%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman"
SIZE="2">&#147;<U>Bylaws</U>&#148; means the Bylaws of the Company updated on June&nbsp;6, 1997. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:6px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:5%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">&#147;<U>Sterling</U>&#148; means Sterling
Winthrop, Inc., a company of the State of Delaware. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:6px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:5%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">&#147;<U>Territory A</U>&#148; means the countries and geographic zones described in
Annex 1.1. enclosed herewith. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:6px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:5%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">&#147;<U>Net Sales</U>&#148; means, for any given period and for any Product, the gross amounts billed by the
Marketing Entities to any Person (except for transfers between any Party and its Subsidiaries only for purposes of resale, the use for promotional purposes or clinical tests), <I>less </I>(i)&nbsp;quantity and/or price rebates, deductions and/or
discounts actually granted or given, (ii)&nbsp;freight carriage and insurance expenses for shipping (if they are identified separately in invoices), (iii)&nbsp;sales taxes related directly to the sale to the extent that they are included in the
gross billing price (but not including the taxes based on revenue arising from these sales) and (iv)&nbsp;the amounts paid back or credited for rejection, expiration or return of such Product. </FONT></P> <P
STYLE="font-size:6px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P>

<TD VALIGN="top"> <P STYLE="margin-left:1.00em; text-indent:-1.00em"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">Company</FONT></P></TD>
<TD VALIGN="bottom"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD VALIGN="bottom"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">Recitals</FONT></TD></TR>
</TABLE> <P STYLE="margin-top:18px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B><U>ARTICLE 2 &#150; TERRITORY MANAGEMENT COMMITTEE </U></B></FONT></P> <P
STYLE="font-size:6px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>2.1</B></FONT></TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B><U>Territory Management Committee</U>.</B> Subject to the general control and decisions of the Strategic Alliance Committee, of the License Steering Committee and of the
Functional Committees, pursuant to this article 2.1, the strategy for the management and exploitation of the Company will be determined by the Partners in a Territory Management Committee (the &#147;<U>Territory Management Committee</U>&#148;) which
will be responsible for: </FONT></TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="font-size:6px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="10%"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD WIDTH="6%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">(i)</FONT></TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">following and ensuring the application of the policies and strategies approved by the Strategic Alliance Committee and the License Steering Committee and the Functional Committees
and ensuring that the action of the Company and its beneficiaries and sub-licensees is compliant with these policies and strategies; </FONT></TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="font-size:6px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="10%"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD WIDTH="6%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">(ii)</FONT></TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">providing indications and ensuring the coordination of the Co-Promotion Entities and the other Marketing Entities concerning the matters of policy and Production;
</FONT></TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="font-size:6px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="10%"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD WIDTH="6%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">(iii)</FONT></TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">accumulating the Annual Budget Objectives and the Long-Term Plans of the Co-Promotion Entities in a form that is substantially that of <U>Annexes 3.2 (a)(ii)-1</U> and <U>3.2
(a)(ii)-2</U> enclosed; </FONT></TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="font-size:6px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="10%"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD WIDTH="6%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">(iv)</FONT></TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">following up on the accumulated budgets of the Co-Promotion Entities within a [*] variation margin and informing the two Partners of any differential outside this variation margin;
</FONT></TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="font-size:6px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="10%"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD WIDTH="6%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">(v)</FONT></TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">following up on the sales and market shares of each of the Products in each country of Territory A; </FONT></TD></TR></TABLE> <P
STYLE="font-size:6px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="10%"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD WIDTH="6%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">(vi)</FONT></TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">checking the Marketing plans of the Marketing Entities and production and supply plans for Territory A; and </FONT></TD></TR></TABLE> <P
STYLE="font-size:6px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="10%"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD WIDTH="6%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">(vii)</FONT></TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">approving the distribution of the sales effort between the local Subsidiaries of the Partners in each country where there is Co-Promotion, such as that offered by such local
Subsidiaries. </FONT></TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
 <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">* CONFIDENTIAL TREATMENT REQUESTED. CONFIDENTIAL PORTION HAS BEEN FILED SEPARATELY WITH THE SECURITIES AND EXCHANGE
COMMISSION </FONT></P>

 <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><I>This text is a free translation from the French language and is supplied solely for information
purposes. </I></FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><I>Only the original version in the French language has legal force. </I></FONT></P> <P
STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P>

 <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="right"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">7 </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P>

<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>2.2</B></FONT></TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B><U>Composition and Decision Making</U>.</B> (a)&nbsp;The Territory Management Committee will permanently have ten (10)&nbsp;members, five (5)&nbsp;of whom will be appointed by
the Sanofi Partner and five (5)&nbsp;will be appointed by the BMS Partner. The members appointed by the Sanofi Partner will be persons filling the positions of (i)&nbsp;President of Sanofi Winthrop, (ii)&nbsp;President of Sanofi Region A,
(iii)&nbsp;President of Sanofi Region B, (iv)&nbsp;Controller of Sanofi Pharma, and (v)&nbsp;Vide President of Alliance Management, Sanofi Pharma. The members appointed by the BMS Partner will be the persons filling the positions of
(i)&nbsp;President of BMS France; (ii)&nbsp;President of BMS International Pharmaceutical Group, (iii)&nbsp;President, BMS European Pharmaceutical Group, (iv)&nbsp;Vice President, Finance, BMS U.S. Pharmaceutical Group, and (v)&nbsp;Vice President
Alliance Management. If one of these positions was modified or eliminated, the Partner concerned will appoint a person whose position is substantially similar to the position modified or eliminated. </FONT></TD></TR></TABLE> <P
STYLE="margin-top:6px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:5%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">(b) The Territory Management Committee will adopt procedural rules substantially in the form of <U>Annex 2.2(b)</U> enclosed, which will govern the
international operations of the Territory Management Committee. These rules may be modified only by the unanimous vote of the members of the Territory Management Committee unless otherwise set forth herein or in these rules, in the event of deadlock
or tie in the vote in the Territory Management Committee due to the controlling participation of the Sanofi Partner in the Company, a member appointed by the Sanofi Partner will have deciding vote, with the understanding that any decision concerning
article 2.1(a)(vii) hereof will be made only by consensus between the representatives of the Sanofi Partner and BMS Partner members of the Territory Management Committee. </FONT></P> <P
STYLE="font-size:6px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>2.3</B></FONT></TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B><U>Delegation</U>.</B> By express decision voted upon unanimously, the Territory Management Committee may establish any subcommittee and delegate its powers to such subcommittee
under the conditions it deems appropriate; <I>it is understood, however</I>, that each of the Partners will have the right to appoint an equal number of members in each subcommittee. </FONT></TD></TR></TABLE> <P
STYLE="margin-top:18px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B><U>ARTICLE 3 POWERS AND OBLIGATIONS OF THE MANAGER(S) </U></B></FONT></P> <P STYLE="font-size:6px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>3.1</B></FONT></TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B><U>Powers</U>.</B> The manager(s) will be responsible for the implementation of the decisions, under the control of the Partners acting by simple majority, and will perform his
(their) obligations under the control of the Partners acting by simple majority, which will be subject to the control of the Territory Management Committee. </FONT></TD></TR></TABLE> <P
STYLE="font-size:6px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>3.2</B></FONT></TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B><U>Financial Statements</U>.</B> (a)&nbsp;The manager(s) will prepare and deliver to the Partners, with the help of the latter, pursuant to the applicable laws and regulations,
at the expense of the Company: </FONT></TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="font-size:6px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="10%"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD WIDTH="6%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">(i)</FONT></TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"> <P ALIGN="left"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">within 30 days after the end of each calendar month, a declaration listing for the previous months and for the corporate Financial Year until the last day of that
month (x)&nbsp;financial statements accumulated country by country for the Co-Promotion Entities of Territory A, (y)&nbsp;and the Net Sales of Products in the </FONT>
</P></TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P>

<FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">countries of Territory A where there is no Co-Marketing of the Products and (z)&nbsp;the marketing and development expenses covered by the Company in the

Co-Promotion entities (the &#147;<U>Annual Budget Objectives</U>&#148;) for each Product and projections for accumulated sales and accumulated profits before taxes for the Co-Promotion Entities for the three following Financial Years (the
&#147;<U>Long Term Plans</U>&#148;) for each Product, which budget objectives and projections will be substantially in the form of Annex <U>3.2 (a)&nbsp;(ii)-1</U> and <U>3.2 (a)&nbsp;(ii)-2</U> enclosed; with the understanding that the profit
before taxes must be calculated by accumulating the profits before taxes of the Co-Promotion Entities for each Product and the Net Sales will be calculated by accumulating the sales of the Co-Promotion Entities for each Product according to the
accounting method established by the Finance Committee; and (y)&nbsp;a statement listing, (1)&nbsp;for each of the countries where there is Co-Promotion of Products, the Net Sales and profits before taxes expected for each Product for the following
Financial Year and the projections of Net Sales and profits before taxes for each Product for the three following Financial Years, and (2)&nbsp;for each country where there is Co-Marketing of Products, the Net Sales of each Product expected for the
following Financial Year and the projections for each Product for the three Financial Years to come and (z)&nbsp;the annual budget of the Company; </FONT></TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="font-size:6px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P>
