<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">during the months of April, July, and October of each Financial Year, a statement providing the revised annual projections of the accumulated sales and profits before taxes of the
Co-Promotion Entities for each Product for that Financial Year (which will be calculated in the same fashion as and by comparison to the Annual Budget Objectives for said Financial Year approved by the Strategic Alliance Committee), revised, if
necessary, to take into account the actual results of the ongoing year as at the date of preparation and all other pertinent factors as well as an explanation of any substantial revision in projections concerning the amounts of the budgets approved
by the Strategic Alliance Committee (each a &#147;<U>Revised Projection</U>&#148;); </FONT></TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="font-size:6px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P>

Company; and </FONT></TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P>

 <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="right"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">9 </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P>

<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">

<TD WIDTH="6%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">(v)</FONT></TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">as soon as possible and in any case within thirty (30)&nbsp;days from the end of each tax quarter, a copy of the unaudited quarterly financial statements of the Company;
</FONT></TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="margin-top:6px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:5%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><I>with the understanding </I>that concerning paragraph (i)&nbsp;above, the Manager(s) will provide, under the control of the
Partners acting by simple majority, to the Strategic Alliance Committee the data, but only for information and concerning paragraphs (ii)&nbsp;and (iii)&nbsp;above, the Manager(s) will provide, under the control of the Partners acting by simple
majority, the data to the Strategic Alliance Committee, which will have only the power to approve the Annual Budget Objectives, the Long Term Plans and the budget of the Company. </FONT></P> <P
STYLE="margin-top:6px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:5%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">(b) Each Partner will provide, as soon as possible, (i)&nbsp;all additional financial information to the Company as requested by the other Partner for the
preparation of its tax returns; and (ii)&nbsp;the other information reasonably requested in writing by the other Partner, including any information requested by this Partner or its Subsidiaries for the needs or legal requirements of notification
imposed under American or French law, securities or other applicable laws. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:6px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:5%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">(c) The Manager(s) will also report as soon as possible to the
Partners and the latter will transmit to the Strategic Alliance Committee that it appears from the Revised Projection (or if they reach this conclusion at any time), that the accumulated annual profit before tax of the Co-Promotion Entities of
Territory A will be lower than [*] or more than [*] of the accumulated annual profit before tax projected by the Annual Budget Objective approved by the Strategic Alliance Committee. </FONT></P> <P
STYLE="font-size:6px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>3.3.</B></FONT></TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B><U>Actions for Patents and Trademarks</U>.</B> The Manager(s), at the request of one or the other of the Partners, must file suit or act in the name of the Company (i)&nbsp;for
counterfeit against a third party for impairment of any patent or any trademark given under license [by] the Company, (ii)&nbsp;to defend against an action filed by a third party against the Company, a Partner or one of their respective Subsidiaries
for counterfeit of a patent and/or trademark related to Irbesartan, Clopidogrel or one of the two Products in Territory A or (iii)&nbsp;to defend against any action filed by a third party because of the invalidity or nullity of a patent filed in the
name of the Company. The costs and expenses of such action or defense will be paid by the Company and any settlement will be decided upon by mutual consent between the Partners. </FONT></TD></TR></TABLE> <P
STYLE="margin-top:18px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B><U>ARTICLE 4 &#150; EXPLOITATION MODALITIES </U></B></FONT></P> <P STYLE="font-size:6px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>4.1</B></FONT></TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"> <P ALIGN="left"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B><U>Distribution</U>.</B> In each country of Territory A (other than Non-Promotional Countries), one or several entities selected by the Strategic Alliance
Committee (each being a &#147;<U>Marketing Entity</U>&#148;) will be responsible for the marketing, promotion, sale and distribution of the Products. Each Marketing Entity will buy the finished Products of the Company under a distribution agreement
</FONT>
</P></TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
 <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">* CONFIDENTIAL TREATMENT REQUESTED. CONFIDENTIAL PORTION HAS BEEN FILED SEPARATELY WITH THE SECURITIES AND EXCHANGE
COMMISSION </FONT></P>


<p Style='page-break-before:always'>
<HR  SIZE="3" COLOR="#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">


 <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><I>This text is a free translation from the French language and is supplied solely for information
purposes. </I></FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><I>Only the original version in the French language has legal force. </I></FONT></P> <P
STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P>

 <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="right"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">10 </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P>

<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"> <P>
<FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">pursuant to article 4.2(b)-(c)&nbsp;hereof with the modifications required by local law and commercial practice including, without limitation thereto, any
requirement of the local law under which a Marketing Entity is prohibited from buying finished products and may purchase only chemically active substances and will place the products on the market directly or using the services of the local
Subsidiaries of the Partners. </FONT></P></TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="font-size:18px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>4.2</B></FONT></TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B><U>Marketing Strategy</U>. </B></FONT></TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="margin-top:6px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:5%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">(a) The marketing
strategy of each Product in each country of Territory A will be presented in a marketing plan (the &#147;<U>Marketing Plan</U>&#148;) prepared by the Marketing Entity in this country in accordance with and pursuant to the policies and strategies
established by the Marketing Work Group (including and without limitation thereto those presented in the general marketing plan centrally financed for each Product developed by the Marketing Work Group) and reviewed by the Territory Management
Committee not later than thirty (30)&nbsp;days after the registration date of the Application for New Drug in the country, in the case of the Clopidogrel Products and as soon as possible after the date hereof in the case of the Irbesartan Products.
Each Marketing Plan will contain a description of the basic marketing strategy in said country, provisional annual budgets and statements of profit and loss for the Product over the first three (3)&nbsp;calendar years after the launch, provisions
for the <I>detailing</I> of the Product, marketing strategy and provisions for the contribution of the Partners and their Subsidiaries to sales resources. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:6px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:5%"><FONT
FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">(b) Should the Strategic Alliance Committee determine that there will be Co-Promotion of the Products in the country of Territory A, a Marketing Entity in the form of joint venture (a &#147;<U>Co-Promotion
Entity</U>&#148;) will be established in this country. The form and structure of each Co-Promotion entity will be determined by the Finance Committee. 50.1% of the voting rights, profit and losses of each Co-Promotion entity will be the property of
the Subsidiary directly or indirectly held with a majority by Sanofi, and 49.9% of the voting rights, profits and losses of each Co-Promotion Entity will be the property of a Subsidiary directly or indirectly held with majority by BMS. Each
Co-Promotion Entity will be the exclusive distributor of the Products in its territory and will enter into a distribution contract with the Company in the form agreed upon by the Partners (a &#147;<U>Co-Promotion Distribution Agreement</U>&#148;)
and will hire the local Subsidiaries of Sanofi and BMS to provide marketing and exploitation services pursuant to a Marketing and Exploitation Service Agreement in a form agreed upon between the Partners (a &#147;<U>Marketing and Exploitation
Service Agreement</U>&#148;) each with the modifications required by local law and commercial practices, including, without limitation thereto, any requirement of the local law under which a marketing entity is prohibited from buying finished
products and may buy only chemically active substances. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:6px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:5%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">(c) Should the Strategic Alliance Committee determine that there will be
Co-Marketing of the Products in the countries of Territory A, the Strategic Alliance Committee will designate the Subsidiaries directly or indirectly held with majority </FONT>
</P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
 <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">* CONFIDENTIAL TREATMENT REQUESTED. CONFIDENTIAL PORTION HAS BEEN FILED SEPARATELY WITH THE SECURITIES AND EXCHANGE
COMMISSION </FONT></P>

<HR  SIZE="3" COLOR="#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">


 <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><I>This text is a free translation from the French language and is supplied solely for information
purposes. </I></FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><I>Only the original version in the French language has legal force. </I></FONT></P> <P
STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P>

 <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="right"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">11 </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
 <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:5%">
<FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">by Sanofi and BMS to be co-exclusive distributors of the Products in said country and each of those Subsidiaries will enter into a distribution agreement
with the Company in the form agreed between the Partners (the &#147;<U>Co-Marketing Distribution Agreement</U>&#148; and, with the &#147;<U>Co-Promotion Distribution Agreement</U>,&#148; the &#147;<U>Distribution Agreements</U>&#148;) each with the
modifications required by local law and commercial practices, including, without limitation thereto, any requirement of the local law under which a Marketing Entity is prohibited from buying finished Products and can buy only chemically active
ingredients. In any country of Territory A where there is Co-Marketing, the Co-Marketing Distribution Agreements to be executed with the Co-Marketing Entities will be identical (except for the parties) and will be executed simultaneously. Where
possible, each Partner will exclusively use the sales, marketing, promotion and distribution resources or those of its Subsidiaries in each country of Territory A where there is Co-Marketing of Products. </FONT></P> <P
STYLE="margin-top:6px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:5%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">(d) The Strategic Alliance Committee may determine that there will be no Co-Promotion or Co-Marketing of the Products in any country in Territory A and,
to the extent that special circumstances so require, may consider the promotion in that country by a Subsidiary of a single Partner, a sub-license to a third party, the distribution or any other agreements. </FONT></P> <P
STYLE="font-size:6px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>4.3</B></FONT></TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B><U>Non-Promotional Countries</U>.</B> In Non-Promotional Countries, the local Subsidiaries of the Partners will not be obligated to execute Distribution Agreements to market and
sell the Products in that country, but if they execute similar agreements, they will have the right to receive a fair compensation for the use of their resources. The Finance Committee will prepare and submit to the Territory Management Committee
for implementation a decision concerning the alternative distribution agreements with the local Subsidiaries for these countries including, without limitation thereto, the rate of such fair compensation. </FONT></TD></TR></TABLE> <P
STYLE="font-size:6px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>4.4</B></FONT></TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B><U>Administrative and Exploitation Services</U>.</B> The administrative and exploitation services needed by the Company will be provided pursuant to a service agreement to be
executed between the Company and a Subsidiary of the Partner Sanofi in a form to be agreed upon by the Partners (the &#147;<U>Service Agreement with the Company</U>&#148;). </FONT></TD></TR></TABLE> <P
STYLE="font-size:6px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>4.5</B></FONT></TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B><U>Development Services</U>.</B> The development services required for the Products will be provided under a Development Service Agreement to be executed between the Company, a
Subsidiary of the Partner Sanofi and a Subsidiary of the Partner BMS in a form to be agreed upon by the Partners (the &#147;<U>SNC Service Agreement</U>&#148;) (the &#147;<U>Development Service Agreement</U>&#148;). </FONT></TD></TR></TABLE> <P
STYLE="margin-top:18px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B><U>ARTICLE 5 &#150; ADVERSE EVENT REPORTING </U></B></FONT></P> <P STYLE="font-size:6px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>5.1</B></FONT></TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"> <P ALIGN="left"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B><U>Reporting Obligation</U>.</B> The Partner BMS and the Partner Sanofi will each make sure, in the marketing of the Products in Territory A, themselves and
their respective Subsidiaries will examine and analyze all Adverse </FONT>
</P></TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
 <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">* CONFIDENTIAL TREATMENT REQUESTED. CONFIDENTIAL PORTION HAS BEEN FILED SEPARATELY WITH THE SECURITIES AND EXCHANGE
COMMISSION </FONT></P>

local law related to the reporting and of the Adverse Events and Serious Adverse Events and each Partner will require its Subsidiaries, sub-licensees and distributors to keep it informed of these events. </FONT></P></TD></TR></TABLE> <P

les Serious Adverse Events will be reported to the Person concerned, as indicated above, within three (3)&nbsp;business days after the time a Partner becomes aware of such event (a &#147;<U>Reporting Partner</U>&#148;) and must be reported by fax as
indicated above. The Reporting Partner must communicate the other Adverse Events every month. The Reporting Partner will quickly notify the Person concerned, as indicated above, of any claim received by him, sufficiently detailed and within
sufficient time to allow the Person concerned to comply with all regulatory requirements imposed on such person in any country. Each Partner will also notify the Person concerned of any regulatory development (for example, proposed recalls, labeling
and other changes in the fields of registration) affecting any of the Products in any country of Territory A. Both the Partner Sanofi and the Partner BMS will have the right to review and/or request copies of all information and reporting forms
issued or received by the Person concerned. The procedures may be modified from time to time by the Regulation Committee (as this term is defined in the Know-How License Agreement). </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT

 <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:5%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">(b) Pursuant to the <I>Alliance Support Agreement</I>, BMS will determine the reporting procedure of the
Adverse Events and Serious Adverse Events concerning the Irbesartan Products to the appropriate Government Authorities and Sanofi will determine the reporting procedure of the Adverse Events and Serious Adverse Events concerning the Clopidogrel
Products to the appropriate Government Authorities. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:18px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B><U>ARTICLE 6 &#150; DISSOLUTION </U></B></FONT></P> <P
STYLE="font-size:6px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>6.1</B></FONT></TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B><U>Dissolution</U>. </B>Notwithstanding the causes of dissolution set forth in the Bylaws, the Company will also dissolve and its activity liquidated when suspending the
marketing of the two Products for Safety Problems according to Section&nbsp;7.04 of the <I>Alliance Support Agreement</I>. </FONT></TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="font-size:6px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>6.2</B></FONT></TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B><U>End of the Marketing of a Product</U>. </B>If the marketing of a Product ends in Territory A by the action of Sanofi or BMS pursuant to Section&nbsp;7.04 of the <I>Alliance
Support Agreement</I>, the Partners will amend the Bylaws of the Company to eliminate any reference to the development, purchase, sale, marketing, promotion or commercialization of this Product. </FONT></TD></TR></TABLE> <P
STYLE="font-size:6px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>6.3</B></FONT></TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B><U>The effects of the Dissolution: Cancellation</U>.</B> Notwithstanding the effects of the dissolution described in the Bylaws, in case of dissolution of the Company,
</FONT></TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="margin-top:6px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:5%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">(a) the Partners must cancel and guarantee the cancellation by their respective Subsidiary(ies) of the Service Agreement of
the Company, the Development Agreement, as well as the agreements of the Marketing Entities concerning the Products (including, without limitation, the Distribution Agreements between the Company and each Marketing Entity) and except in the event of
dissolution due to a Security Problem, the Company will assign or give under license all remaining assets of the Company as well as its rights and obligations under the License and Supply Agreement of Clopidogrel, the License Agreement of
Irbersartan, the Supply Agreement of Irbersartan, the Know-How License Agreement, the Puerto Rico Purchase and Sale Agreement and the Toll Manufacturing Agreement, except for the rights on the corporate names and trademarks, including the terms
&#147;Sanofi,&#148; &#147;BMS,&#148; or &#147;Bristol-Myers Squibb,&#148; <I>with the understanding, however</I>, that the obligations to supply chemically active substances or finished Products established in said agreements will continue to be
applied for one year after the assignment or license; </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:6px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:5%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">(b) the proceeds of this sale will be allocated as follows in the priority order
indicated: </FONT></P> <P STYLE="font-size:6px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="10%"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD WIDTH="6%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">(i)</FONT></TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">to the payment of the debts and liabilities of the Company and liquidation expenses; </FONT></TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT

a Reporting made according to this article. All Reportings made according to this article will be reputed to have been made on the date of their receipt in the event of personal delivery by overnight courier or fax, or ten (10)&nbsp;business days
after mailing in the event of registered letter or mailing with acknowledgment of receipt. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="font-size:6px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P>

<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>7.2</B></FONT></TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B><U>Governing law</U>.</B> This Internal Regulation, as well as the related rights and obligations, are subject to French law. </FONT></TD></TR></TABLE> <P
STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
 <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">* CONFIDENTIAL TREATMENT REQUESTED. CONFIDENTIAL PORTION HAS BEEN FILED SEPARATELY WITH THE SECURITIES AND EXCHANGE
COMMISSION </FONT></P>


<p Style='page-break-before:always'>
<HR  SIZE="3" COLOR="#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">


 <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><I>This text is a free translation from the French language and is supplied solely for information
purposes. </I></FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><I>Only the original version in the French language has legal force. </I></FONT></P> <P
STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P>

 <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="right"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">16 </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P>

<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>7.3</B></FONT></TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B><U>Forced Performance</U>.</B> Each of the Partners acknowledges that the lack of performance of one of the obligations hereunder will cause irreparable damage. Consequently, the
forced performance of these obligations may be required to the full extent allowed by law<I>; it is understood, however, </I>that the powers of the arbitrators (under this article 7.3) will be limited to enforcing the obligations set forth in this
Internal Regulation in its current language. </FONT></TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="font-size:6px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>7.4</B></FONT></TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B><U>Disputes</U>.</B> Any disagreements between the Partners arising from the Internal Regulation will be finally settled according to the Regulation of the International Chamber
of Commerce by three (3)&nbsp;arbitrators appointed according to this Regulation. The arbitral proceedings will be conducted in English in Paris, France. The President of the arbitral tribunal will be neither a US nor a French citizen.
</FONT></TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="font-size:6px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>7.5</B></FONT></TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B><U>Headings</U>.</B> All headlines and subheadings of the Internal Regulation are for convenience only, and none of them will be reputed to affect the meaning or influence the
interpretation hereof. </FONT></TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="font-size:6px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>7.6</B></FONT></TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B><U>Relative effect</U>.</B> The Internal Regulation is not binding or benefiting for any party except the Partners and their successors and authorized assignees, and no express
or implicit provision is intended or will be reputed to give rights, advantages or any remedy to any person, of any nature whatsoever </FONT></TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="font-size:6px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>7.7</B></FONT></TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B><U>Severability</U>.</B> Should one of the legal and regulatory conditions [sic], the validity and application of the other conditions and provisions of the Internal Regulation
will not be affected and will remain fully valid and in effect provided the substance of the transactions hereunder is not materially affected. Whenever it is determined that one of the conditions or provisions of the Internal Regulation is null,
contrary or incompatible with legal and regulatory provisions, the Partners undertake to negotiate in good faith the modification of the Internal Regulation in order to achieve as reliably as possible the original intent of the Partners in order to
conduct the transactions hereunder according to the initial intent of the Partners. </FONT></TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="font-size:6px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>7.8</B></FONT></TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B><U>Transfer</U>.</B> This agreement may be assigned by one of the Partners only to a Subsidiary of Sanofi or BMS in case of reorganization (including to an entity that becomes a
Subsidiary as part of such reorganization) causing the takeover of all or almost all marketing and/or production functions of this Partner in Territory A, in which case the rights may be assigned and the obligations may be delegated to this
Subsidiary. </FONT></TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="font-size:6px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>7.9</B></FONT></TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B><U>Acceptances</U>.</B> All acceptances or authorizations of the acts or issues required by the Internal Regulation must be given in writing and concern only the specific act or
issue for which the consent or authorization is given, and may not relieve one of the Partners from the obligation to obtain, if applicable, the consent or authorization required by the Internal Regulation for another act or another issue.
</FONT></TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
 <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">* CONFIDENTIAL TREATMENT REQUESTED. CONFIDENTIAL PORTION HAS BEEN FILED SEPARATELY WITH THE SECURITIES AND EXCHANGE
COMMISSION </FONT></P>


<p Style='page-break-before:always'>

purposes. </I></FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><I>Only the original version in the French language has legal force. </I></FONT></P> <P
STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P>

 <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="right"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">17 </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P>

<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>7.10</B></FONT></TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B><U>Whole Agreement</U>.</B> The Internal Regulation with the Bylaws expressing the whole agreement between the Partners as to its object, they cancel and replace all prior
contracts concerning this object and not indicated herein or in the Bylaws. </FONT></TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="font-size:6px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>7.11</B></FONT></TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B><U>Waivers and Modifications</U>.</B> No modification of the Internal Regulation is valid unless it is in writing and signed by the two Partners and refers expressly to the
Internal Regulation or Bylaws mentioning the intent of the Partners to modify the Internal Regulation or the Bylaws. Any waiver of any of the conditions hereof must be made in writing, signed by the Partner intending to waive, referring expressly to
the condition waived by it, and no waiver may constitute waiver of any other violation of the same condition or of any other condition or provision hereof. </FONT></TD></TR></TABLE> <P
STYLE="font-size:6px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>7.12</B></FONT></TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B><U>Exclusion of Creditors</U>.</B> The provisions of the Internal Regulation are deemed to govern the relations between the Partners and the relations between the Partners and
the Company. The Internal Regulation is not deemed to benefit the creditors which are not Partners and no right may be given to non-Partner creditors hereunder. </FONT></TD></TR></TABLE> <P
STYLE="font-size:6px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>7.13</B></FONT></TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B><U>Duplicates</U>.</B> The Internal Regulation may be signed in several counterparts, each constituting an original, but the whole will constitute a single instrument.
</FONT></TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="font-size:6px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>7.14</B></FONT></TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B><U>Effective Date</U>.</B> The Internal Regulation will enter into effect on January&nbsp;1, 1997 even though it is signed on June&nbsp;6, 1997. </FONT></TD></TR></TABLE> <P
STYLE="font-size:6px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>7.15</B></FONT></TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B><U>Applicable Language</U>.</B> The Partners acknowledge that the Internal Regulation may be translated into English. The Partners agree that the French version of the Internal
Regulation will be the decisive version for any issue. </FONT></TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="font-size:6px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>7.16</B></FONT></TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B><U>Terms Starting with a Capital Letter</U>.</B> The terms starting with capital letters not defined in this Internal Regulation will have the meaning given to them in the
Bylaws. </FONT></TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
 <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">* CONFIDENTIAL TREATMENT REQUESTED. CONFIDENTIAL PORTION HAS BEEN FILED SEPARATELY WITH THE SECURITIES AND EXCHANGE

<TD VALIGN="bottom"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;&nbsp;</FONT></TD></TR>
<TR>
<TD VALIGN="bottom"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;&nbsp;</FONT></TD></TR>
<TR>
<TD VALIGN="bottom"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;&nbsp;</FONT></TD></TR>
<TR>

</TABLE> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
 <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">* CONFIDENTIAL TREATMENT REQUESTED. CONFIDENTIAL PORTION HAS BEEN FILED SEPARATELY WITH THE SECURITIES AND EXCHANGE
COMMISSION </FONT></P>


<p Style='page-break-before:always'>
<HR  SIZE="3" COLOR="#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">


 <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><I>This text is a free translation from the French language and is supplied solely for information
purposes. </I></FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><I>Only the original version in the French language has legal force. </I></FONT></P> <P
STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P>

 <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
 <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B><U>ANNEX 2.2(b) </U></B></FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT
FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B><U>Rules of the Territory Management Committee </U></B></FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">The following rules were adapted according to
the bylaws updated on January&nbsp;1, 1997 between Partner Sanofi and Partner BMS (the &#147;<U>Bylaws</U>&#148;) concerning the operation of the Territory Management Committee (the &#147;<U>Committee</U>&#148;) and may not be amended or modified
other than by unanimous vote of the Committee only. All terms starting with a capital letter but not defined in this document will have the meaning given to them in the bylaws, as amended from time to time. </FONT></P> <P
STYLE="font-size:6px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>1.</B></FONT></TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B><U>President and Co-President</U>.</B> The meetings of the Committee will be presided over by a president (the &#147;<U>President</U>&#148;) and in his absence by a co-president
(the &#147;<U>Co-President</U>&#148;). Partner Sanofi and Partner BMS will appoint, respectively, the President and the Co-President. </FONT></TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="font-size:6px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>2.</B></FONT></TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B><U>Ordinary Meetings</U>.</B> The Committee will provide in the resolutions for the holding of ordinary meetings and will establish the time and place of these meetings;
<I>however, it is understood </I>that these meetings will be held once per calendar quarter. It is not necessary to give notice of ordinary meetings; <I>however, it is understood </I>that if the time or place of ordinary meetings are established or
changed, a notice in this regard will quickly be sent by mail to each member of the Committee who was not present at the meeting where the decision was made, sending it to such member at his usual place of activity, at the most, 10 days after the
date of the meeting during which the decision was made. The meetings will take place in Paris, New York, or any other place reasonably chosen by the President. </FONT></TD></TR></TABLE> <P
STYLE="font-size:6px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>3.</B></FONT></TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B><U>Extraordinary Meetings</U>.</B> The extraordinary meetings of the Committee will be held upon invitation from or by decision of the President or Co-President or any two
members of the Committee. Unless otherwise agreed by all members of the Committee, a notice of each extraordinary meeting will be sent by fax (with confirmed acknowledgment of receipt) to each member of the Committee addressing it to this member at
his usual place of activity at the latest 10 days before the date scheduled for the meeting. This notice must indicate the time, place, and agenda of the meeting. Unless otherwise provided, any member of the Committee who attends a meeting in person
will be presumed to have waived receiving notice of such meeting. Extraordinary meetings will be held in Paris, New York, or any other place reasonably chosen by the President. </FONT></TD></TR></TABLE> <P
STYLE="font-size:6px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>4.</B></FONT></TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"> <P ALIGN="left"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B><U>Quorum and Decision Making Method</U>.</B> In each meeting of the Committee, the presence of a majority of the members of the Committee, including at least
three (3)&nbsp;members appointed by Partner Sanofi and at least three (3)&nbsp;members appointed by Partner BMS will be necessary to constitute a quorum for the operations. In the absence of the quorum, the majority of those present at the time and
place of any meeting may postpone the meeting from date to date but not beyond 30 days after the date of this </FONT>
</P></TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
 <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">* CONFIDENTIAL TREATMENT REQUESTED. CONFIDENTIAL PORTION HAS BEEN FILED SEPARATELY WITH THE SECURITIES AND EXCHANGE
COMMISSION </FONT></P>


<p Style='page-break-before:always'>
<HR  SIZE="3" COLOR="#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">


 <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><I>This text is a free translation from the French language and is supplied solely for information
purposes. </I></FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><I>Only the original version in the French language has legal force. </I></FONT></P> <P
STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P>

 <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="right"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">2 </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P>

<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"> <P>
<FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">meeting, by written notice to the absent members, until a quorum is present, and the postponed meeting is held. Unless otherwise agreed by all the members of
the Committee or as specified in the Association Agreement, the majority vote of all the members of the Committee present or represented in any meeting in which a quorum is present is necessary to decide on any issue mentioned in the meeting.
</FONT></P></TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="font-size:6px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>5.</B></FONT></TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B><U>Resignation of the Members of the Committee</U></B><B>.</B> Any member of the Committee may resign at any time with written notice of resignation to the President and
Co-President. Unless otherwise set forth in this notice, this resignation takes effect upon its receipt by the President and the Co-President and the acceptance of the resignation will not be necessary for it to become effective.
</FONT></TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="font-size:6px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>6.</B></FONT></TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B><U>Revocation of a Member of the Committee</U>.</B> Either one of the Partners will have the right, with written notice to the other Partner, at any time, to replace any or all
the members designated by it in the Committee or fill any vacancies left by a member designated by it, without the consent of the other Prater; <I>with the understanding, however, </I>that any newly appointed person will be the person replacing the
member of the Committee revoked in the position listed in article 11.2 (a)&nbsp;of the bylaws which was filled by this member of the Committee or, if one of these positions was modified or eliminated, in a position substantially similar to the
position modified or eliminated. </FONT></TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="font-size:6px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>7.</B></FONT></TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B><U>Remuneration of the Members of the Committee</U></B><B>.</B> The members of the Committee will not receive any remuneration for their services as such, be it in the form of
salary or fixed payment to attend the meetings. No stipulation hereof will be interpreted as a prohibition for a member of the Committee to serve the Partner represented by him on the Committee in another capacity for remuneration from such Partner
for this purpose. </FONT></TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="font-size:6px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>8.</B></FONT></TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B><U>Decisions without Meeting</U></B><B>.</B> Subject to the stipulations (a)&nbsp;of the bylaws and (b)&nbsp;of the applicable laws and regulations, any decision which could not
be made according to these rules by a vote of the members of the Committee in a meeting of the Committee may be made without meeting if all the members of the Committee consent and the document(s) is (are) entered in the minutes of the Committee.
</FONT></TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="font-size:6px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>9.</B></FONT></TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B><U>Telephone Meetings and Videoconferences</U></B><B>.</B> The committee may hold, and any member of the Committee may participate in, a Meeting of the Committee by
teleconference, videoconference with similar communication allowing all the members participating in the Meeting to hear and speak to each other and the participation in a meeting according to this paragraph 9 will constitute a case of presence in
person at the Meeting. </FONT></TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="font-size:6px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>10.</B></FONT></TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B><U>Powers of Attorney</U>.</B> Any member of the Committee may, to the extent authorized by the applicable law, authorize another person belonging to the senior management of
Sanofi or BMS to act in its stead by a power of attorney duly signed and by the presence of such authorized person which will be equivalent to his own presence in person at the meeting. </FONT></TD></TR></TABLE> <P
STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
 <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">* CONFIDENTIAL TREATMENT REQUESTED. CONFIDENTIAL PORTION HAS BEEN FILED SEPARATELY WITH THE SECURITIES AND EXCHANGE
COMMISSION </FONT></P>


<p Style='page-break-before:always'>
<HR  SIZE="3" COLOR="#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">


 <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><I>This text is a free translation from the French language and is supplied solely for information
purposes. </I></FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><I>Only the original version in the French language has legal force. </I></FONT></P> <P
STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P>

 <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="right"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">3 </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P>

<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>11.</B></FONT></TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"> <P ALIGN="left"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B><U>Minutes</U>.</B> The Committee will have written records in good and due form of the outcome of its meetings and will report on them to each member of the
Committee. These written records will be kept in English. A written report on each meeting of the Committee, including the main recommendations, will be delivered to all the members of the Committee and all persons designated by the Partners within
30 days following the date of the meeting and will be presumed approved in the absence of an objection by the 15</FONT><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="1"><SUP STYLE="vertical-align:baseline; position:relative; bottom:.8ex">th</SUP></FONT><FONT
FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"> day following the date of delivery. </FONT></P></TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
 <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">* CONFIDENTIAL TREATMENT REQUESTED. CONFIDENTIAL PORTION HAS BEEN FILED SEPARATELY WITH THE SECURITIES AND EXCHANGE
COMMISSION </FONT></P>


<p Style='page-break-before:always'>
<HR  SIZE="3" COLOR="#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">


 <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><I>This text is a free translation from the French language and is supplied solely for information
purposes. </I></FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><I>Only the original version in the French language has legal force. </I></FONT></P> <P
STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P>

 <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B><U>ANNEX 3.2(a)(ii)-1 </U></B></FONT></P> <P
STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px;padding-bottom:3px;" ALIGN="center"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B><U>ANNUAL BUDGET OBJECTIVES<FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="1"><SUP
STYLE="vertical-align:baseline; position:relative; bottom:.8ex">2</SUP></FONT><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"> </FONT></U></B></FONT></P> <P STYLE="font-size:12px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P>

<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="2%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"></FONT><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="1"><SUP STYLE="vertical-align:baseline; position:relative; bottom:.8ex">1</SUP></FONT><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">
</FONT></TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"> <P ALIGN="left"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">Was prepared by management for information. </FONT></P></TD></TR></TABLE>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="2%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"></FONT><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="1"><SUP STYLE="vertical-align:baseline; position:relative; bottom:.8ex">2</SUP></FONT><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">
</FONT></TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"> <P ALIGN="left"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">Transmitted for information only. </FONT></P></TD></TR></TABLE>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="2%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"></FONT><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="1"><SUP STYLE="vertical-align:baseline; position:relative; bottom:.8ex">3</SUP></FONT><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">
</FONT></TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"> <P ALIGN="left"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">Only these elements are submitted for approval. </FONT></P></TD></TR></TABLE>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="2%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"></FONT><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="1"><SUP STYLE="vertical-align:baseline; position:relative; bottom:.8ex">4</SUP></FONT><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">
</FONT></TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"> <P ALIGN="left"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">Information on sales will also be provides for the countries in which Co-Marketing is carried out. </FONT></P></TD></TR></TABLE>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="2%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"></FONT><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="1"><SUP STYLE="vertical-align:baseline; position:relative; bottom:.8ex">5</SUP></FONT></TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"> <P ALIGN="left"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="1"><SUP STYLE="vertical-align:baseline; position:relative; bottom:.8ex"></SUP></FONT><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">Includes <I>Central R&amp;D</I>, central
marketing, and other direct costs of the company. </FONT></P></TD></TR></TABLE>

<TR>
<TD WIDTH="2%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"></FONT><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="1"><SUP STYLE="vertical-align:baseline; position:relative; bottom:.8ex">1</SUP></FONT><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">
</FONT></TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"> <P ALIGN="left"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">Was prepared by management for information. </FONT></P></TD></TR></TABLE>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="2%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"></FONT><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="1"><SUP STYLE="vertical-align:baseline; position:relative; bottom:.8ex">2</SUP></FONT><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">

<TITLE>Partnership Agreement - Bristol Myers Squibb Sanofi Pharmaceuticals Holding</TITLE>
</HEAD>
 <BODY BGCOLOR="WHITE">

 <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="right"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>Exhibit 10.3 </B></FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT
FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">* CONFIDENTIAL TREATMENT REQUESTED. CONFIDENTIAL PORTION HAS BEEN FILED </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">SEPARATELY WITH THE SECURITIES AND
EXCHANGE COMMISSION </FONT></P> <P STYLE="font-size:12px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P> <P STYLE="line-height:0px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:2px;border-bottom:0.5pt solid #000000">&nbsp;</P> <P
STYLE="margin-top:24px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">PARTNERSHIP AGREEMENT </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">OF </FONT></P> <P
STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">BRISTOL-MYERS SQUIBB SANOFI PHARMACEUTICALS HOLDING PARTNERSHIP </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT
FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">between </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">SANOFI PHARMACEUTICALS, INC. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px"
ALIGN="center"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">and </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">BRISTOL-MYERS SQUIBB COMPANY INVESTCO, INC. </FONT></P> <P
STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">dated as of January&nbsp;1, 1997 </FONT></P> <P STYLE="font-size:24px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P> <P
STYLE="line-height:0px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:2px;border-bottom:0.5pt solid #000000">&nbsp;</P>

 <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
 <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">PARTNERSHIP AGREEMENT dated as of January&nbsp;1, 1997 between Sanofi Pharmaceuticals, Inc., a
Delaware corporation (&#147;<U>Sanofi Partner</U>&#148;) and an indirect wholly owned subsidiary of Sanofi, a <I>soci&eacute;t&eacute; anonyme </I>organized under the laws of the French Republic (&#147;<U>Sanofi</U>&#148;), and Bristol-Myers Squibb
Company Investco, Inc. (&#147;<U>BMS Partner</U>&#148; and, together with Sanofi Partner, the &#147;<U>Partners</U>&#148; and, individually, each a &#147;<U>Partner</U>&#148;), a Delaware corporation and a direct wholly owned subsidiary of
Bristol-Myers Squibb Company, a Delaware corporation (&#147;<U>BMS</U>&#148;). </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:18px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><U>W</U> <U>I</U> <U>T</U> <U>N</U> <U>E</U> <U>S</U>
<U>S</U> <U>E</U> <U>T</U> <U>H</U>: </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">WHEREAS, BMS, Sanofi and Sterling Winthrop Inc., a Delaware corporation
(&#147;<U>Sterling</U>&#148;), entered into a Development Agreement dated as of July&nbsp;29, 1993 (the &#147;<U>Development Agreement</U>&#148;) concerning the development of two new chemical entities discovered and patented by Sanofi, one known as
SR 47436, with the international non-proprietary name Irbesartan (&#147;<U>Irbesartan</U>&#148;) and one known as SR 25990C, with the international non-proprietary name Clopidogrel Hydrogenosulphate (&#147;<U>Clopidogrel</U>&#148;), each with
potential ethical pharmaceutical applications in the cardiovascular therapeutic field; </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">WHEREAS, BMS, Sanofi and Sterling entered into a
Master Territory B Agreement dated as of July&nbsp;29, 1993 (the &#147;<U>Master Territory B Agreement</U>&#148;) for the commercialization of the Products in Territory B (as such terms are defined herein); </FONT></P> <P
STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">WHEREAS, pursuant to an Amended and Restated Asset Purchase Agreement dated as of September&nbsp;30, 1994 among Eastman Kodak Company, Sanofi and
Sterling, Sanofi acquired certain assets, and assumed certain obligations, of the ethical pharmaceutical business of Sterling, including the rights and obligations of Sterling under the Master Territory B Agreement and the Development Agreement;
</FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">WHEREAS, in accordance with Section&nbsp;4.1.1 of the Master Territory B Agreement, BMS and Sanofi agreed to determine an appropriate
legal structure to be implemented for the commercialization of the Products in Territory B; </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">WHEREAS, as of the date hereof, BMS and Sanofi
have entered into a Territory B Alliance Support Agreement (the &#147;<U>Alliance Support Agreement</U>&#148;) and certain other agreements for the commercialization of the Products in Territory B; and </FONT></P> <P
STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">WHEREAS, in determining such appropriate legal structure, BMS and Sanofi have agreed that the United States of America would no longer be included within
the definition of Territory B solely with respect to Irbesartan and Irbesartan Products (as defined herein) and intend to enter into a license agreement concerning the manufacture, sale and commercialization of Irbesartan Products in the United
States of America (the &#147;<U>U.S. Irbesartan License</U>&#148;); </FONT></P> <P STYLE="font-size:12px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P> <P STYLE="font-size:12px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P> <P
STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">SS_NYL2/121210 19 (PA_79524 2) </FONT></P> <P STYLE="font-size:12px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P> <P
STYLE="font-size:12px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P> <P STYLE="font-size:12px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P> <P STYLE="font-size:12px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P> <P
STYLE="font-size:12px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P> <P STYLE="font-size:12px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
 <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">* CONFIDENTIAL TREATMENT REQUESTED. CONFIDENTIAL PORTION HAS BEEN FILED SEPARATELY WITH THE SECURITIES AND EXCHANGE
COMMISSION </FONT></P>

 <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">
 2
 </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
 <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">NOW, THEREFORE, in consideration of the mutual covenants and the terms and conditions contained
herein, and for other good, valuable and binding consideration, the receipt and sufficiency of which are hereby acknowledged, the Partners hereto agree as follows: </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:18px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT
FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">ARTICLE I </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">DEFINITIONS </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT
FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">SECTION 1.01. <U>Defined Terms</U>. As used in this Agreement, the following terms shall have the following meanings: </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:6px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:4%; text-indent:4%"><FONT
FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">&#147;<U>Act</U>&#148; means the Delaware Uniform Partnership Law, set forth as Title 6 of the Delaware Code Annotated, as amended from time to time, and any applicable successor statutes thereto. </FONT></P> <P
STYLE="margin-top:6px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:4%; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">&#147;<U>Adverse Event</U>&#148; means any negative symptom experienced at the time of or after the taking of any Product of which any
Partner or any of its Affiliates becomes aware, whether or not considered drug related, including, without limitation, any side effects, injury, toxicity or sensitivity reaction, or significant failure of expected pharmacological action, as well as
instances of symptomatic overdose, abuse or withdrawal reactions. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:6px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:4%; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">&#147;<U>Affiliate</U>&#148;, when used with reference to
any Person, means any other Person controlling, controlled by, or under common control with, such Person; <I>provided, however, </I>that, with respect to Sanofi, the definition of Affiliate shall exclude Elf Aquitaine and any Person not controlled
by Sanofi that would be an Affiliate of Sanofi solely by reason of its being controlled by Elf Aquitaine. For the purposes of this definition, &#147;<U>control</U>&#148; shall refer to (a)&nbsp;the possession, directly or indirectly, of the power to
direct the management or policies of a Person or to veto any material decision relating to the management or policies of a Person, in each case whether through the ownership of voting securities, by contract or otherwise, (b)&nbsp;the beneficial
ownership, directly or indirectly, of securities (excluding general partnership interests) representing at least 40% of the voting power of all outstanding voting securities of a Person or (c)&nbsp;the beneficial ownership of at least 50% of the
partnership interests of a general partnership. The Partners confirm that each Co-Promotion Entity in Territory B shall be considered to be an Affiliate of BMS. </FONT></P> <P
STYLE="margin-top:6px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:4%; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">&#147;<U>Agreement</U>&#148; means this Partnership Agreement, as originally executed and as amended, modified, supplemented or restated
from time to time, in accordance with Section&nbsp;12.11 hereof. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="font-size:12px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P> <P STYLE="font-size:12px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P> <P
STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">SS_NYL2/121210 19 (PA_79524 2) </FONT></P> <P STYLE="font-size:12px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P> <P

STYLE="font-size:12px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P> <P STYLE="font-size:12px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P>

 3

Securities Exchange Act of 1934, as amended, </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:6px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:4%; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">&#147;<U>Capital Account</U>&#148; means, with respect to each Partner, the
capital account maintained for such Partner as set forth in Article III hereof. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:6px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:4%; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">&#147;<U>Capital Contribution</U>&#148;
means, with respect to each Partner, the amount of money contributed to the Partnership by such Partner (or such Partner&#146;s predecessors in interest) with respect to the Partnership Interest held by such Partner. </FONT></P> <P

STYLE="margin-top:6px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:4%; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">&#147;<U>Co-Marketing</U>&#148; means, for each Product and for any country in Territory B, the marketing of such Product in such country
under two or more trademarks by the applicable Marketing Entities. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:6px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:4%; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">&#147;<U>Co-Promotion</U>&#148; means, for each Product
and for any country in Territory B, the marketing of such Product in such country under one trademark by the applicable Marketing Entity. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:6px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:4%; text-indent:4%"><FONT

 4

 <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:4%; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">&#147;<U>Functional Committees</U>&#148; means the Alliance Functional Committees (as
defined in the Alliance Support Agreement) and the License Functional Committees (as defined in the Know-How License Agreement). </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:6px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:4%; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman"
SIZE="2">&#147;<U>Governmental Authority</U>&#148; means any federal, state or local or any foreign or supranational government, governmental, regulatory or administrative authority, agency or commission or any court, tribunal or judicial or
arbitral body. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:6px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:4%; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">&#147;<U>Irbesartan License Agreement</U>&#148; means the Irbesartan Intellectual Property License Agreement
dated as of the date hereof between the Partnership and Sanofi for the license of certain patent, trademark and know-how rights for Irbesartan and Irbesartan Products from Sanofi to the Partnership in exchange for the payment to Sanofi of the
Discovery Royalty (as <SMALL>S</SMALL>uch term is defined therein). </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:6px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:4%; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">&#147;<U>Irbesartan Product</U>&#148; means the product

SIZE="2">&#147;<U>Irbesartan Supply Agreement</U>&#148; means the Irbesartan Supply Agreement to be entered into among BMS, Sanofi, the Partnership and Sanofi Pharma Bristol-Myers Squibb, a <I>soci&eacute;t&eacute; en nom collectif </I>organized
under the laws of the French Republic, for the supply of active substance chemical bulk for Irbesartan. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:6px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:4%; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">&#147;<U>Know-How
License Agreement</U>&#148; means the Product Know-How License Agreement dated as of the date hereof among the Partnership, Sanofi and BMS for the license of know-how developed by Sanofi and BMS pursuant to the Development Agreement, the use of
corporate names by the Partnership and the development of Irbesartan and Clopidogrel on or after such date in exchange for the payment of the Development Royalty (as such term is defined therein) by the Partnership. </FONT></P> <P
STYLE="margin-top:6px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:4%; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">&#147;<U>License Steering Committee</U>&#148; has the meaning set forth in the Know-How License Agreement. </FONT></P> <P

STYLE="margin-top:6px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:4%; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">&#147;<U>Net Income</U>&#148; and &#147;<U>Net Loss</U>&#148; mean, for each Fiscal Year, an amount equal to the Partnership&#146;s
taxable income or loss for such Fiscal Year, determined in accordance with Code Section&nbsp;703(a) (for this purpose, all items of income, gain, loss or deduction required to be stated separately pursuant to Code Section&nbsp;703(a)(l) shall be
included in taxable income or loss), with the following adjustments: </FONT></P> <P STYLE="font-size:12px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P> <P STYLE="font-size:12px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P> <P
STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">SS_NYL2/121210 19 (PA_79524 2) </FONT></P> <P STYLE="font-size:12px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P> <P
STYLE="font-size:12px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P> <P STYLE="font-size:12px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P> <P STYLE="font-size:12px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P> <P
