this Agreement, will not infringe any patent or other intellectual property right of any Third Party. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:18px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>ARTICLE 9 </B></FONT></P> <P
STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>TERM; TERMINATION </B></FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">9.1 <U>Term;
Termination.</U> (a)&nbsp;The term of this Agreement shall commence on the date hereof and shall expire on the later of (x)&nbsp;the 15th anniversary of the first commercial sale of a Clopidogrel Product and (y)&nbsp;such date as the last Licensed
Patent effective in any country in Territory B shall have expired and all other <I>de jure </I>exclusivity available for a Clopidogrel Product shall have ended. Thereafter, the term of this Agreement may be renewed for successive three-year terms,
respectively, by the mutual agreement of the Parties no later than 24 months prior to the expiration of the term then in effect. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">(b)
Notwithstanding the foregoing, this Agreement shall automatically expire upon the earlier of (i)&nbsp;the termination by both Parties of the commercialization of Clopidogrel Products throughout Territory B as the result of a Safety Problem pursuant
to Section&nbsp;7.04 (iii)&nbsp;of the Alliance Support Agreement and (ii)&nbsp;the exercise by BMS of the special put option pursuant to Section&nbsp;7.08 of the Alliance Support Agreement. </FONT></P> <P
STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">(c) This Agreement may be terminated by the mutual written consent of each of Licensor, the Sanofi Partner and the BMS Partner. </FONT></P> <P
STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">(d) Licensor shall have the right to declare termination of this Agreement upon Notice to the Partnership, following the first to occur of: </FONT></P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">(i) the BMS Partner shall have (A)&nbsp;voluntarily commenced any proceeding or filed any petition seeking relief under Title 11 of the United States
Code, French Law No.&nbsp;84-148 of March&nbsp;1, 1984, French Law No.&nbsp;85-98 of January&nbsp;25, 1985 or any other bankruptcy, insolvency or similar law of the United States, any state thereof, the French Republic or any other applicable
jurisdiction, (B)&nbsp;applied for or consented to the appointment of a receiver, trustee, custodian, sequestrator, conciliator, administrator or similar official for it or for all or substantially all of its property, (C)&nbsp;filed an answer
admitting the material allegations of a petition filed against or in respect of it in any such proceeding, (D)&nbsp;made a general assignment for the benefit of creditors of all or substantially all of its assets, (E)&nbsp;become usable generally,
or admitted in writing its inability to, pay all or substantially all of its debts as they become due or (F)&nbsp;taken corporate action for the purpose of effecting any of the foregoing; or </FONT></P> <P
STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">(ii) an involuntary proceeding shall have been commenced or any involuntary petition shall have been filed in a court of competent jurisdiction seeking
(A)&nbsp;relief in respect of the BMS Partner, or of its property, under Title 11 of the </FONT>
</P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P>

 17
.. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
 <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">
<FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">United States Code, French Law No.&nbsp;84-148 of March&nbsp;1<I>, </I>1984, French Law No.&nbsp;85-98 of January&nbsp;25, 1985 or any other bankruptcy,
insolvency or similar law of the United States, any state thereof, the French Republic or any other applicable jurisdiction, (B)&nbsp;the appointment of a receiver, trustee, custodian, sequestrator, conciliator, administrator or similar official for
the BMS Partner or for all or substantially all of its property or (C)&nbsp;the winding-up or liquidation of the BMS Partner; and such proceeding or petition shall have continued undismissed for sixty (60)&nbsp;days or an order or decree approving
or ordering any of the foregoing shall have continued unstayed and in effect for thirty (30)&nbsp;days. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">9.2 <U>Consequences of
Termination</U>. (a)&nbsp;Upon the expiration or early termination of this Agreement pursuant to Section&nbsp;9.1 hereof (the &#147;<U>License Termination Date</U>&#148;): </FONT></P> <P
STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">(i) the terms and conditions of Section&nbsp;7.07 of the Alliance Support Agreement shall apply, except in the event of early termination pursuant to
Section&nbsp;9. l(b) hereof; </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">(ii) the Partnership shall cease, and shall cause each sub-licensee (if any) to cease, all activities related
to the Licensed Intellectual Property; and </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">(iii) the Partnership shall pay in full all amounts due to Licensor hereunder within ten
(10)&nbsp;days after the final determination of Net Sales for such period, including the License Termination Date, pursuant to Sections 6.3, 6.4 and 6.6 hereof which shall survive until the full payment of all amounts under this clause (iii).
</FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">(b) In the event of the termination of the commercialization of the Clopidogrel Products in any country(ies) of Territory B pursuant to
Section&nbsp;7.02 of the Alliance Support Agreement: </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">(i) the terms and conditions of Section&nbsp;9.2(a)(ii)-(iii)&nbsp;hereof shall
apply, <I>mutatis mutandis, </I>with respect to such country(ies); and </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">(ii) all rights and licenses granted by Licensor hereunder with
respect to such country(ies) shall revert to Licensor, subject to Section&nbsp;7.03 of the Alliance Support Agreement. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">(c) Expiration or
early termination of this Agreement pursuant to this Article 9 shall be without prejudice to any rights which shall have accrued to the benefit of any Party prior to such expiration or termination. Such expiration or termination shall not relieve
any Party from its obligations which are expressly indicated to survive the expiration or termination of this Agreement. All of the Parties&#146; rights and obligations under this subclause (c)&nbsp;and under Sections 6.5, 6.7, 7.1, 7.2, 9.2 and
11.2-11.4 and Article 10 hereof shall survive such expiration or termination for the applicable period. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="right"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">. </FONT></P> <P
STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
 <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">* CONFIDENTIAL TREATMENT REQUESTED. CONFIDENTIAL PORTION HAS BEEN FILED SEPARATELY WITH THE SECURITIES AND EXCHANGE
COMMISSION </FONT></P>

 <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>ARTICLE 10 </B></FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT
FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>CONFIDENTIALITY </B></FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">All of the data, material and information exchanged by the Parties hereunder or
related hereto (including, without limitation, the Licensed Intellectual Property) shall be subject to the confidentiality provisions of the Alliance Support Agreement as set forth in Section&nbsp;5.03 thereof. </FONT></P> <P
STYLE="margin-top:18px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>ARTICLE 11 </B></FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>MISCELLANEOUS
</B></FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">11.1 <U>Notices</U>. All notices, requests or other communications hereunder (collectively, &#147;<U>Notices</U>&#148;) shall be in
writing, shall be in the English language and shall be given or made by delivery in person, by courier service, by facsimile (with receipt confirmed) or by registered or certified mail (return receipt requested, with postage prepaid) to the
respective Parties at the following addresses: </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">If to Licensor, to: </FONT></P> <P

by any Party hereto to the other Party hereto. All Notices given to any Party in accordance with this Section&nbsp;11.1 shall be deemed to have been given on the date of receipt if delivered by hand or overnight courier service or sent by facsimile,
or on the date ten (10)&nbsp;business days after dispatch by certified or registered mail (postage prepaid) if mailed. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">11.2 <U>Governing
Law.</U> This Agreement shall be governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of the State of New York, United States of America, without regard to the choice of law principles that might otherwise be applied in such jurisdiction.
</FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">11.3 <U>Dispute Resolution.</U> All disputes between the Parties arising in connection with this Agreement (other than those specifically
referred to in Section&nbsp;6.6 hereof) shall be finally settled under the Rules of Conciliation and Arbitration of the International Chamber of Commerce, and the number of arbitrators shall be three. Each of Licensor and the Partnership shall
designate one arbitrator and the two so appointed arbitrators shall jointly designate the third arbitrator. If such designation is not made within fifteen days of the designation of the second party-designated arbitrator, the Secretary General of
the International Court of Arbitration of the International Chamber of Commerce </FONT>
</P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
 <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">* CONFIDENTIAL TREATMENT REQUESTED. CONFIDENTIAL PORTION HAS BEEN FILED SEPARATELY WITH THE SECURITIES AND EXCHANGE
COMMISSION </FONT></P>


<p Style='page-break-before:always'>
<HR  SIZE="3" COLOR="#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">


 <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="right"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">
 20
.. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
 <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">
<FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">shall designate the third arbitrator. The proceedings shall be conducted in the English language in Paris, France. The president of any arbitral tribunal
shall not be a citizen of either the United States of America or the French Republic. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">11.4 <U>Specific Performance.</U> Each Party agrees
that the Licensed Intellectual Property is unique, and that a failure by any Party to perform its obligations under this Agreement will result in irreparable damage, and that specific performance of such obligations may be obtained without the
posting of any bond or other security; <I>provided, however, </I>that the powers of the arbitrators under this Section&nbsp;11.4 shall be limited to enforcing the obligations provided for in this Agreement as drafted. </FONT></P> <P
STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">11.5 <U>No Third Party Beneficiaries.</U> This Agreement shall be binding upon and inure solely to the benefit of the Parties (including the Sanofi
Partner and the BMS Partner, each in its capacity as a partner of the Partnership) and permitted sub-licensees and assigns, and nothing herein, express or implied, is intended to, or shall confer upon, any other Person any legal or equitable right,
benefit or remedy of any nature whatsoever. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">11.6 <U>Assignment.</U> (a)&nbsp;This Agreement may be assigned by a Party only to an
Affiliate of Licensor or BMS in the event of a corporate reorganization (including an entity that becomes an Affiliate in connection with such reorganization) involving the assumption of all or substantially all of such Party&#146;s marketing or
manufacturing functions in Territory B by such Affiliate, in which event the rights may be assigned and the obligations may be delegated to such Affiliate. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT
FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">(b) Notwithstanding anything to the contrary contained in subclause (a)&nbsp;above, this Agreement may be assigned, in whole or in part, by, or on behalf of, the Partnership as a result of a termination event under
either Section&nbsp;7.04 or Section&nbsp;7.06 of the Alliance Support Agreement or as a result of the dissolution of the Partnership (other than for a Safely Problem) and in any such event shall be deemed to be amended and restated (i)&nbsp;to
delete Section&nbsp;4.2 hereof, as well as any reference to the Alliance Support Agreement, (ii)&nbsp;to insert those terms and conditions that are then customary in the pharmaceutical industry for an intellectual property license agreement,
including, without limitation, provisions for confidentiality, indemnification and termination for material breach, as well as a diligence requirement that the assignee shall use reasonable commercial efforts to actively promote Clopidogrel Products
(and the remedy for breach of such diligence requirement shall be termination of such amended and restated agreement) and (iii)&nbsp;to-require the supplying entity(ies) to supply Clopidogrel Bulk to such assignee until, and for no longer than, the
first anniversary of such assignment. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">11.7 <U>Severability.</U> If any term or other provision hereof is held to be invalid, illegal or
incapable of being enforced by applicable law or public policy, all other terms and provisions hereof shall nevertheless remain in full force and effect so long as the economic effect or legal substance of the transactions contemplated hereby is not
affected in any manner materially adverse to any Party. Upon such determination that any term or other provision is invalid, illegal or incapable of being enforced, the Parties shall negotiate in good faith to modify this Agreement so as to effect
the original intent of the Parties as closely as possible in an acceptable manner in order that the transactions contemplated hereby are consummated as originally contemplated to the greatest extent possible. </FONT></P> <P
STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
 <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">* CONFIDENTIAL TREATMENT REQUESTED. CONFIDENTIAL PORTION HAS BEEN FILED SEPARATELY WITH THE SECURITIES AND EXCHANGE
COMMISSION </FONT></P>


<p Style='page-break-before:always'>
<HR  SIZE="3" COLOR="#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">


 <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="right"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">
 21
.. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
 <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">11.8 <U>Waivers and Amendments.</U> No modification of or amendment to this Agreement shall be valid
unless in a writing signed by both Parties referring specifically to this Agreement and stating the Parties&#146; intention to modify or amend the same. Any waiver of any term or condition of this Agreement shall be in a writing signed by the Party
sought to be charged with such waiver referring specifically to the term or condition to be waived, and no such waiver shall be deemed to constitute the waiver of any other breach of the same or of any other provision hereof. </FONT></P> <P
STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">11.9 <U>Headings.</U> All titles and captions contained in this Agreement are for the convenience of reference only and shall not affect in any way the
meaning or interpretation hereof. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">11.10 <U>Entire Agreement</U> This Agreement constitutes the entire agreement of the Parties with
respect to the subject matter contained herein and all prior agreement relative thereto which are not contained herein are hereby terminated. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman"
SIZE="2">11.11 <U>No Partnership or Joint Venture.</U> This Agreement is not intended to create, and nothing contained herein shall be construed to create an association, joint venture, trust or partnership, or to impose a trust or partnership
covenant, obligation or liability on or with regard to the other Party. Each Party shall be severally responsible for its own covenants, obligations and liabilities as herein provided. Other than the Partnership: (i)&nbsp;no Party shall be under the
control of, or shall be deemed to control any other Party; (ii)&nbsp;no Party is the legal representative, agent, joint venturer or employee of the other Party with respect to this Agreement for any purpose whatsoever, and no Party shall have the
right or power to bind the other Party; and (iii)&nbsp;no Party has the right or authority to assume or create any obligations of any kind or to make any representation or warranty on behalf of any other Party, whether express or implied, or to bind
any other Party in any respect whatsoever. The provisions of this Agreement are intended only for the regulation of relations between the Parties. This Agreement is not intended for the benefit of non-Party creditors, and no rights are granted to
non-Party creditors under this Agreement. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">11.12 <U>Governing Language.</U> The Parties acknowledge that this Agreement may be translated
into the French language. The Parties agree that this English language version shall in all respects be the controlling version of this Agreement. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman"
SIZE="2">11.13 <U>Force Majeure</U>. No Party shall be in default under this Agreement, or shall have any obligation to the other Party, if such Party is unable to perform under this Agreement by reason of act of God, fire, flood, strike, national
emergency or other contingency beyond its reasonable control (a &#147;<U>Force Majeure</U>&#148;). Such Party shall give the other Party prompt notice of any interruption of performance on account of Force Majeure, and of the resumption of such
performance, and shall keep the other Party informed on a current basis as to the steps being taken to remove, and the anticipated time of removal of, the circumstances resulting in such Force Majeure. Notwithstanding the foregoing, nothing in this
Section&nbsp;11.13 shall excuse or suspend the obligation to make any payment due under this Agreement in the manner and at the time provided herein. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
 <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">* CONFIDENTIAL TREATMENT REQUESTED. CONFIDENTIAL PORTION HAS BEEN FILED SEPARATELY WITH THE SECURITIES AND EXCHANGE
COMMISSION </FONT></P>


<p Style='page-break-before:always'>
<HR  SIZE="3" COLOR="#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">


 <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="right"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">
 22
.. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
 <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">11.14 <U>Counterparts.</U> This Agreement may be executed in one or more counterparts, each of which
when executed shall be deemed to be an original, but all of which when taken together shall constitute one and the same agreement. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">IN
WITNESS WHEREOF, the Parties have duly executed this Agreement as of the day and year first written above. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="font-size:12px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P>

 <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="right"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>Exhibit 10.10 </B></FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT
FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">* CONFIDENTIAL TREATMENT REQUESTED. CONFIDENTIAL PORTION HAS BEEN FILED </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">SEPARATELY WITH THE SECURITIES AND
EXCHANGE COMMISSION </FONT></P> <P STYLE="font-size:12px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P> <P STYLE="line-height:3px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:2px;border-bottom:0.5pt solid #000000">&nbsp;</P> <P
STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">PRODUCT KNOW-HOW LICENSE AGREEMENT </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">among

COMPANY </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">and </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">SANOFI PHARMA
BRISTOL-MYERS SQUIBB </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">dated as of January&nbsp;1,1997 </FONT></P> <P STYLE="font-size:12px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P> <P

 <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">* CONFIDENTIAL TREATMENT REQUESTED. CONFIDENTIAL PORTION HAS BEEN FILED </FONT></P> <P
STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">SEPARATELY WITH THE SECURITIES AND EXCHANGE COMMISSION </FONT></P>


<p Style='page-break-before:always'>
<HR  SIZE="3" COLOR="#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">


 <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
 <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">This PRODUCT KNOW-HOW LICENSE AGREEMENT (this &#147;<U>Agreement</U>&#148;) dated as of
January&nbsp;1, 1997 is hereby made by and among: </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">Sanofi, a <I>soci&eacute;t&eacute; anonyme </I>organized and existing under the laws of
the French Republic (&#147;<U>Sanofi</U>&#148;); </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">Bristol-Myers Squibb Company, a corporation organized and existing under the laws of the
State of Delaware, United States of America (&#147;BMS&#148;); and </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">Sanofi Pharma Bristol-Myers Squibb, a<I> soci&eacute;t&eacute; en nom
collectif </I>organized<I> </I>and existing under the laws of the French Republic (the &#147;<U>SNC Partnership</U>&#148; and, together with Sanofi and BMS, the &#147;<U>Parties&#148;</U> and, individually, each a &#147;<U>Party&#148;</U>).
</FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:18px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B><U>WITNESSETH</U>:</B> </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman"
SIZE="2">WHEREAS, Sanofi has discovered and patented two new chemical entities, one known as SR 47436 with the international non-proprietary name Irbesartan (&#147;<U>Irbesartan</U>&#148;) and one known as SR 25990C with the international
non-proprietary name Clopidogrel Hydrogenosulphate (&#147;<U>Clopidogrel</U>&#148;), with potential ethical pharmaceutical applications in the cardiovascular therapeutic field; </FONT></P> <P
STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">WHEREAS, Sanofi, BMS and Sterling Winthrop Inc., a Delaware corporation (&#147;<U>Sterling</U>&#148;) entered into a Development Agreement dated
July&nbsp;29, 1993 (the &#147;<U>Development Agreement</U>&#148;) for, among other things, the development of Irbesartan and Clopidogrel; </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman"
SIZE="2">WHEREAS, pursuant to an Amended and Restated Asset Purchase Agreement dated as of September&nbsp;30, 1994 among Eastman Kodak Company, Sanofi and Sterling, Sanofi acquired certain assets, and assumed certain obligations, of the ethical
pharmaceutical business of Sterling, including the rights and obligations of Sterling under the Development Agreement; </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">WHEREAS, Sanofi and
BMS have entered into a Territory A Alliance Support Agreement dated as of the date hereof (the &#147;<U>Alliance Support Agreement</U>&#148;) and have formed through their indirect wholly owned subsidiaries the SNC Partnership pursuant to the
<I>statuts </I>to be amended and restated as of June&nbsp;6, 1997 (the &#147;<U>SNC By-Laws</U>&#148;) for, among other things, the commercialization of the Products in Territory A (as such terms are defined herein); </FONT></P> <P
STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">WHEREAS, Sanofi and the SNC Partnership have entered into an Irbesartan Intellectual Property License Agreement (the &#147;<U>Irbesartan License
Agreement</U>&#148;) and a Clopidogrel Intellectual Property License and Supply Agreement dated as of the date hereof, pursuant to which Sanofi has granted a license to use certain patents, trademarks and know-how for the commercialization of the
Products in Territory A that neither were developed with nor are owned by BMS; </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
 <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">* CONFIDENTIAL TREATMENT REQUESTED. CONFIDENTIAL PORTION HAS BEEN FILED </FONT></P> <P
STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">SEPARATELY WITH THE SECURITIES AND EXCHANGE COMMISSION </FONT></P>


<p Style='page-break-before:always'>
<HR  SIZE="3" COLOR="#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">


 <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="right"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">
 2
 </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
 <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">WHEREAS, Sanofi and BMS have developed certain know-how under the Development Agreement for the
commercialization of the Products in Territory A and, as a result, each has an undivided one-half direct ownership interest in the Developed Know-How (as such term is defined herein); and </FONT></P> <P
STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">WHEREAS, Sanofi and BMS are willing to grant to the SNC Partnership, and the SNC Partnership is willing to accept, a license under the Developed Know-How
for the commercialization of the Products in Territory A on the terms and conditions set forth herein. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">NOW, THEREFORE, in consideration of
the mutual covenants and the terms and conditions set forth herein, the Parties hereby agree as follows: </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:18px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>ARTICLE 1 </B></FONT></P> <P
STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>DEFINITIONS </B></FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">1.1 <U>Defined Terms.</U>
As used in this Agreement, the following terms shall have the following meanings: </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">&#147;<U>Adverse Event</U>&#148; means any negative
symptom experienced at the time of or after the taking of any Product of which any Party or any of its Affiliates becomes aware, whether or not considered drug related, including, without limitation, any side effects, injury, toxicity or sensitivity
reaction, or significant failure of expected pharmacological action, as well as instances of symptomatic overdose, abuse or withdrawal reactions. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman"
SIZE="2">&#147;<U>Affiliate</U>&#148;, when used with reference to any Person, means any other Person controlling, controlled by, or under common control with, such Person; <I>provided, however, </I>that, with respect to Sanofi, the definition of
Affiliate shall exclude Elf Aquitaine and any Person not controlled by Sanofi that would be an Affiliate of Sanofi solely by reason of its being controlled by Elf Aquitaine. For the purposes of this definition, &#147;<U>control</U>&#148; shall refer
to (a)&nbsp;the possession, directly or indirectly, of the power to direct the management or policies of a Person or to veto any material decision relating to the management or policies of a Person, in each case whether through the ownership of
voting securities, by contract or otherwise, (b)&nbsp;the beneficial ownership, directly or indirectly, of securities (excluding general partnership interests) representing at least 40% of the voting power of all outstanding voting securities of a
Person or (c)&nbsp;the beneficial ownership of at least 50% of the partnership interests of a general partnership. The Parties confirm that each Co-Promotion Entity (as defined in the Alliance Support Agreement) in Territory A shall be considered to
be an Affiliate of Sanofi. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">&#147;<U>Alliance Agreements</U>&#148; has the meaning set forth in the Alliance Support Agreement. </FONT></P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">&#147;<U>Alliance Strategic Committee</U>&#148; has the meaning set forth in the Alliance Support Agreement. </FONT></P> <P
STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">&#147;<U>Clopidogrel Product</U>&#148; means the product or products having as an active ingredient Clopidogrel or any salt, ester, metabolite or
pro-drug thereof. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
 <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">* CONFIDENTIAL TREATMENT REQUESTED. CONFIDENTIAL PORTION HAS BEEN FILED </FONT></P> <P
STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">SEPARATELY WITH THE SECURITIES AND EXCHANGE COMMISSION </FONT></P>


<p Style='page-break-before:always'>
<HR  SIZE="3" COLOR="#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">


 <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="right"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">
 3
 </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
 <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">&#147;<U>Competing Product</U>&#148; means, with respect to any Product, any other product that [*],
but which is not [*] set forth in Schedule [*] or selected for [*] by [*]. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">&#147;<U>Developed Know-How</U>&#148; means any and all
technical data, information, material and other know-how that relate to the formulation of the Products, including, without limitation, any analytical methodology, chemical, toxicological, pharmacological and clinical data, formulae, procedures,
protocols, techniques and results of experimentation and testing, developed by Sanofi and BMS under the Development Agreement. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman"
SIZE="2"><U>&#147;Finance Committee</U>&#148; has the meaning set forth in the Alliance Support Agreement. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><U>&#147;Functional
Committee</U>&#148; means any Alliance Functional Committee (as such term is defined in the Alliance Support Agreement) or any License Functional Committee. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT
FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">&#147;<U>Governmental Authority</U>&#148; means any federal, state or local or any foreign or supranational government, governmental, regulatory or administrative authority, agency or commission or any court, tribunal
or judicial or arbitral body. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">&#147;<U>Irbesartan Product</U>&#148; means the product or products having as an active ingredient
Irbesartan or any salt, ester, metabolite or pro-drug thereof. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">&#147;<U>Lead</U>&#148; means the right to initiate proposals and
implement, or cause the implementation of, recommendations and decisions. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">&#147;<U>Line Extension</U>&#148; means, for each Product and
with respect to development conducted on or after January&nbsp;1, 1997, any new dosage or new form of administration of such Product. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman"
SIZE="2">&#147;<U>MAAs</U>&#148; means, with respect to each Product, any marketing authorizations, licenses, approvals, registrations, certificates and exemptions submitted to or granted by or pending with any Governmental Authority for the purpose
of allowing the manufacture, production, supply, marketing, distribution or sale of such Product in a particular country. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">&#147;<U>Major A
Countries</U>&#148; means France, Germany, Italy, Spain and the United Kingdom, and any other country in Territory A representing at least [*]of aggregate Net Sales of both Products in Territory A, as determined from time to time by [*] .
</FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">&#147;<U>Manufacturing and Sourcing Committee</U>&#148; has the meaning set forth in the Alliance Support Agreement </FONT></P> <P
STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">&#147;<U>Marketing Entity</U>&#148; has the meaning set forth under the definition of <I>Entit&eacute; de Marketing </I>in the R&eacute;glement
Int&eacute;rieur. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
 <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">* CONFIDENTIAL TREATMENT REQUESTED. CONFIDENTIAL PORTION HAS BEEN FILED </FONT></P> <P
STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">SEPARATELY WITH THE SECURITIES AND EXCHANGE COMMISSION </FONT></P>


<p Style='page-break-before:always'>
<HR  SIZE="3" COLOR="#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">


 <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="right"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">
 4
 </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
 <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">&#147;<U>Net Sales</U>&#148; means for any given period and with respect to any Product, the gross
amount invoiced in respect thereof by the Marketing Entities to any Person (excluding any transfers between any Party and its Affiliates solely for purposes of resale, promotional use or clinical trials), <I>less </I>(i)&nbsp;quantity and/or cash
discounts, allowances and/or rebates actually allowed or given, (ii)&nbsp;freight, postage and shipping insurance expenses (if separately identified in such invoice), (iii)&nbsp;sales taxes directly related to the sale to the extent included in the
gross invoice price (but not including taxes assessed against the income derived from such sale) and (iv)&nbsp;amounts repaid or credited on account of rejections, outdating or the return of such Product. </FONT></P> <P
STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">&#147;<U>New Indication</U>&#148; means, for each Product and with respect to development conducted on or after January&nbsp;1, 1997, any new therapeutic
use or application of such Product. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">&#147;<U>Non-Promotional Countries</U>&#148; means the countries in Territory A where the utilization
of personal promotion by sales personnel is not a significant factor in obtaining product usage and achieving sales or where selling is by tender or comparable non-promotional method of sale, as determined from time to time by the Finance Committee.
</FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">&#147;<U>Person</U>&#148; means any individual, partnership, firm, corporation, <I>soci&eacute;t&eacute; anonyme, soci&eacute;t&eacute; en
nom collectif, soci&eacute;t&eacute; en participation, </I>limited liability company, joint venture, association, trust or other entity or any government or any agency or political subdivision thereof, as well as any syndicate or group that would be
deemed to be a person under Section&nbsp;13(d)(3) of the U.S. Securities Exchange Act of 1934, as amended. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">&#147;<U>Product</U>&#148;
means a Clopidogrel Product or an Irbesartan Product and &#147;<U>Products</U>&#148; means both a Clopidogrel Product and an Irbesartan Product. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman"
SIZE="2">&#147;<U>R&eacute;glement Int&eacute;rieur</U>&#148; means the <I>r&eacute;glement int&eacute;rieur </I>to be entered into between BMS Investco S. A.S. and Sanofi Participations with effect as of the date hereof. </FONT></P> <P
STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">&#147;<U>Safety Problem</U>&#148; has the meaning set forth in the Alliance Support Agreement. </FONT></P> <P
STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">&#147;<U>Sanofi Pharma</U>&#148; means Sanofi Pharma, a <I>soci&eacute;t&eacute; anonyme </I>organized and existing under the laws of the French
Republic. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">&#147;<U>Serious Adverse Event</U>&#148; means any Adverse Event that is life-threatening in that such Adverse Event places the
patient at risk of dying, requires hospitalization, prolongs existing hospitalization or results in permanent disability, birth defect, cancer or death. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT
FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">&#147;<U>Territory</U>&#148; means either Territory A or Territory B and &#147;<U>Territories</U>&#148; means both Territory A and Territory B. </FONT></P> <P
STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">&#147;<U>Territory A</U>&#148; means the countries and geographic areas described and listed in <U>Schedule 1A</U> attached hereto. </FONT></P> <P
STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">&#147;<U>Territory B</U>&#148; means the countries and geographic areas described and listed in<U> Schedule 1B</U> attached hereto. </FONT></P> <P
STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
 <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">* CONFIDENTIAL TREATMENT REQUESTED. CONFIDENTIAL PORTION HAS BEEN FILED </FONT></P> <P
STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">SEPARATELY WITH THE SECURITIES AND EXCHANGE COMMISSION </FONT></P>

 <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="right"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">
 5
 </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
 <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">&#147;<U>Third Party</U>&#148; means a Person who or which is neither a Party nor an Affiliate of a
Party. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">1.2 <U>Additional Defined Terms</U>. The following additional defined terms shall have the meanings set forth in the sections of
this Agreement listed below: </FONT></P> <P STYLE="font-size:12px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P>

<TD VALIGN="bottom" ALIGN="center"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">7.1</FONT></TD></TR>
<TR BGCOLOR="#cceeff">
<TD VALIGN="top"> <P STYLE="margin-left:1.00em; text-indent:-1.00em"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">Regulatory Committee</FONT></P></TD>
<TD VALIGN="bottom"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD VALIGN="bottom" ALIGN="center"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">6.2</FONT></TD></TR>
<TR>
<TD VALIGN="top"> <P STYLE="margin-left:1.00em; text-indent:-1.00em"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">Reporting Party</FONT></P></TD>
<TD VALIGN="bottom"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD VALIGN="bottom" ALIGN="center"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">8.2</FONT></TD></TR>
<TR BGCOLOR="#cceeff">
<TD VALIGN="top"> <P STYLE="margin-left:1.00em; text-indent:-1.00em"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">Sanofi</FONT></P></TD>
<TD VALIGN="bottom"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD VALIGN="bottom" ALIGN="center"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">Preamble</FONT></TD></TR>
<TR>
<TD VALIGN="top"> <P STYLE="margin-left:1.00em; text-indent:-1.00em"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">SNC By-Laws</FONT></P></TD>
<TD VALIGN="bottom"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD VALIGN="bottom" ALIGN="center"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">Recitals</FONT></TD></TR>
<TR BGCOLOR="#cceeff">
<TD VALIGN="top"> <P STYLE="margin-left:1.00em; text-indent:-1.00em"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">SNC Partnership</FONT></P></TD>
<TD VALIGN="bottom"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD VALIGN="bottom" ALIGN="center"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">Preamble</FONT></TD></TR>
<TR>
<TD VALIGN="top"> <P STYLE="margin-left:1.00em; text-indent:-1.00em"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">Sterling</FONT></P></TD>
<TD VALIGN="bottom"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD VALIGN="bottom" ALIGN="center"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">Recitals</FONT></TD></TR>
</TABLE> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>ARTICLE 2 </B></FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT
FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>GRANT OF LICENSE </B></FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">2.1 <U>License Grant</U>. Subject to the terms and conditions of this Agreement,
Sanofi and BMS each separately grant to the SNC Partnership an exclusive license for the term hereof in their respective undivided one-half direct ownership interest in the Developed Know-How, and the SNC Partnership hereby accepts, an exclusive
license for the term hereof under the Developed Know-How (i)&nbsp;to make, have made, sell, offer for sale and import the Products in Territory A, (ii)&nbsp;subject to Article 7 hereof, to develop Irbesartan Products and Clopidogrel Products for
Territory A, including, without limitation, New Indications and Line Extensions thereof, and (iii)&nbsp;with the prior approval of the Manufacturing and Sourcing Committee, to make, have made, and export the Products outside of Territory A;
<I>provided, however, </I>that such </FONT>
</P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
 <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">* CONFIDENTIAL TREATMENT REQUESTED. CONFIDENTIAL PORTION HAS BEEN FILED </FONT></P> <P
STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">SEPARATELY WITH THE SECURITIES AND EXCHANGE COMMISSION </FONT></P>


<p Style='page-break-before:always'>
<HR  SIZE="3" COLOR="#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">


 <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="right"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">
 6
 </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
 <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">
<FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">exclusivity shall not apply to Sanofi and BMS with respect to any ongoing studies that are being conducted by Sanofi and BMS under the Development Agreement
(the &#147;Ongoing Studies&#148;). </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">2.2<I> </I><U>No Transfer.</U> The SNC Partnership hereby acknowledges and agrees that this Agreement
does not, and shall not be deemed to, transfer any proprietary ownership interest whatsoever to the SNC Partnership in or to the Developed Know-How. Nothing herein shall give the SNC Partnership any right, title or interest in or to any of the
Developed Know-How, except the rights granted pursuant to this Agreement. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">2.3 <U>No Implicit Rights.</U> All of the rights granted
hereunder are explicitly stated herein and nothing in this Agreement shall be construed to grant any implied rights whatsoever to the SNC Partnership in or to the Developed Know-How. </FONT></P> <P
STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">2.4 <U>Corporate Name Authorization.</U> The SNC Partnership shall he permitted to use both the Sanofi and BMS corporate names, on a [*] basis for the
term hereof, solely (i)&nbsp;as part of its corporate name and (ii)&nbsp;in connection with any promotional, advertising or marketing necessary or desirable for the commercialization of the Products in Territory A in accordance with this Agreement
and the Alliance Support Agreement. The grant of rights pursuant to this Section&nbsp;2.4 shall automatically terminate upon the earlier of (i)&nbsp;the expiration or early termination of this Agreement and (ii)&nbsp;the expiration or early
termination of the Alliance Support Agreement. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">2.5 <U>Goodwill.</U> The SNC Partnership hereby acknowledges that all goodwill connected
with the Sanofi and BMS corporate names shall inure to the benefit of Sanofi and BMS, as the case may be, and the SNC Partnership shall not take any action that may be detrimental to such goodwill. </FONT></P> <P
STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">2.6 <U>Representations and Warranties.</U> Each of BMS and Sanofi represents and warrants to the other Parties hereto that: (i)&nbsp;it has, and will at
all times during the term of this Agreement have, the right, power and authority to license the Developed Know-How and to perform its other obligations hereunder, (ii)&nbsp;it is not aware of any asserted or unasserted claims or demand of any Third
Party it believes to be enforceable against the Developed Know-How and (iii)&nbsp;to the best of such Party&#146;s knowledge and belief, the SNC Partnership&#146;s exercise of any right to the Developed Know-How, as contemplated by this Agreement,
will not infringe any intellectual property right of any Third Party. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">2.7 <U>Improvements.</U> Any new or useful invention, process or
improvement, patentable or unpatentable, relating to the formulation of any Product under the Developed Know-How developed or acquired by the SNC Partnership during the term hereof, shall be the property of the SNC Partnership which shall have all
ownership rights thereto, subject to Article 7 hereof. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
 <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">* CONFIDENTIAL TREATMENT REQUESTED. CONFIDENTIAL PORTION HAS BEEN FILED </FONT></P> <P
STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">SEPARATELY WITH THE SECURITIES AND EXCHANGE COMMISSION </FONT></P>


<p Style='page-break-before:always'>
<HR  SIZE="3" COLOR="#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">


 <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="right"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">
 7
 </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
 <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>ARTICLE 3 </B></FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT
FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>SUB-LICENSE </B></FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">3.1 <U>General Sub-License</U>. Except as permitted under Section&nbsp;3.2 hereof, the
SNC Partnership shall not, without the prior written consent of both Sanofi and BMS, <I>sub</I>-license any of its rights and obligations under this Agreement; <I>provided, however</I>, that if the representatives of Sanofi and BMS on any Functional
Committee, the Alliance Strategic Committee or the License Steering Committee, consensually agree to sub-license any of the SNC Partnership&#146;s rights or obligations hereunder, such agreement shall be deemed to be the consent of Sanofi and BMS
for the purposes of this Section&nbsp;3.1. No such sub-license shall relieve the SNC Partnership of its obligations hereunder. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">3.2
<U>Sub-License for Alliance Agreements.</U> The SNC Partnership shall sub-license those of its rights and obligations under this Agreement, to any Affiliate of Sanofi or BMS that is a party to any Alliance Agreement, solely for the purposes of
permitting such Affiliate to perform its obligations under such Alliance Agreement. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">3.3 <U>Termination of Sub-License.</U> Sanofi and BMS
each shall have the right to require the SNC Partnership to terminate any sub-license of rights hereunder in the event that the sub-licensee fails to comply in any material respect with, or takes any action contrary to, the terms of such sub-license
or any decision made by any Functional Committee, the Alliance Strategic Committee or the License Steering Committee, and such sub-licensee has failed to remedy such non-compliance within thirty (30)&nbsp;days from its receipt of written notice
thereof from Sanofi, BMS or the SNC Partnership. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:18px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>ARTICLE 4 </B></FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"
ALIGN="center"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>PROVISION OF DOCUMENTS </B></FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">4.1 <U>Initial Exchange</U>. As promptly as practicable
following the date hereof, each of Sanofi and BMS shall make available to the SNC Partnership copies of all relevant data, studies and materials comprising Developed Know-How in such Party&#146;s possession that shall be available as of such date.
</FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">4.2 <U>Continuing Exchange</U>. During the term of this Agreement, each of Sanofi and BMS shall make available to the SNC Partnership,
from time to time, copies of all relevant data, studies and materials comprising subsequently developed or acquired Developed Know-How in such Party&#146;s possession as soon as practicable after the development or acquisition thereof. </FONT></P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:18px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>ARTICLE 5 </B></FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>CONSIDERATION </B>
</FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">5.1 <U>Development Royalty</U>. In consideration of the rights and licenses granted hereunder, the SNC Partnership shall pay, or shall
cause to be paid, for the term of this Agreement the following aggregate amounts as a development royalty (each a &#147;<U>Development Royalty</U>&#148;): </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
 <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">* CONFIDENTIAL TREATMENT REQUESTED. CONFIDENTIAL PORTION HAS BEEN FILED </FONT></P> <P
STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">SEPARATELY WITH THE SECURITIES AND EXCHANGE COMMISSION </FONT></P>


<p Style='page-break-before:always'>
<HR  SIZE="3" COLOR="#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">


 <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="right"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">
 8
 </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
 <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">(i) To [*], an amount equal to [*] of Net Sales of Irbesartan Products in Territory A; and
</FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">(ii) To [*], an amount based on Net Sales of Clopidogrel Products in Territory A, which shall be determined by [*] no later than sixty
(60)&nbsp;days after the first commercial sale of any Clopidogrel Product in Territory A. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">5.2 <U>Payment.</U> For the term of this
Agreement, the SNC Partnership shall pay or cause to be paid to each of Sanofi and BMS all amounts due hereunder on a quarterly basis within sixty (60)&nbsp;days of the end of each calendar quarter. Each such payment shall be accompanied by an
accurate statement of the amount of Net Sales of the Products, broken down Product-by-Product, during such calendar quarter and the calculation of all payments to be made to each of Sanofi and BMS for such calendar quarter (each a &#147;<U>Payment
Report</U>&#148;). </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">5.3 <U>Method of Payment.</U> (a)&nbsp;All payments to be made hereunder shall be made by wire transfer in immediately
available funds, and shall be made in French francs to the respective bank accounts of Sanofi and BMS as notified to the SNC Partnership by the relevant Party, unless the Parties agree to settle such payments through other means. </FONT></P> <P
STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">(b) Amounts due from the SNC Partnership to BMS or Sanofi in respect of sales based on a currency other than French francs shall be converted to French
francs using the methodology determined for such purpose by the Finance Committee. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">5.4 <U>Records</U>. The SNC Partnership shall maintain
(i)&nbsp;books, records and accounts which accurately and fairly reflect, in reasonable detail, the Net Sales of the Products and (ii)&nbsp;an adequate system of internal accounting controls. All books, records and accounts referred to in clause
(i)&nbsp;above shall be maintained for not less than three (3)&nbsp;years, or for such longer period if and as required by applicable law, following the date of the sales constituting the Net Sales and shall be made available for reasonable review
upon request by Sanofi and/or BMS. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">5.5 <U>Payment Reports.</U> (a)&nbsp;At the request of BMS, the SNC Partnership shall, and shall if
applicable cause its sub-licensees to, permit BMS or an independent, certified public accountant not having any significant relation to either BMS or Sanofi, as appointed by BMS, at reasonable times and upon reasonable notice, to examine the books
and records of the SNC Partnership as may be necessary to (i)&nbsp;determine, with respect to any calendar quarter ending not more <U>than</U> two (2)&nbsp;years prior to the related request, the correctness of any Payment Report or payment made
under this Agreement or any Alliance Agreement or (ii)&nbsp;obtain information as to the amount payable for any such calendar quarter in the case of failure on the part of the SNC Partnership to report or pay pursuant to this Agreement or on the
part of any party to any&#146; Alliance Agreement; <I>provided, however, </I>that BMS shall not have the right to make such audit request more than once every twelve (12)&nbsp;calendar months. The results of any such audit shall be promptly made
available to BMS, Sanofi and the SNC Partnership. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
 <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">* CONFIDENTIAL TREATMENT REQUESTED. CONFIDENTIAL PORTION HAS BEEN FILED </FONT></P> <P
STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">SEPARATELY WITH THE SECURITIES AND EXCHANGE COMMISSION </FONT></P>


<p Style='page-break-before:always'>
<HR  SIZE="3" COLOR="#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">


 <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="right"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">
 9
 </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
 <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">(b) BMS shall bear the full cost and expense of any such audit, unless such audit discloses that the
amount due to BMS is more than the amount paid by [*] of the amount due, in which case Sanofi shall bear the full cost and expense of such audit. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman"
SIZE="2">(c) The determination by an independent, certified public accountant pursuant to this Section&nbsp;5.5 as to the amount due and payable by the SNC Partnership shall be conclusive and binding on the Parties hereto. </FONT></P> <P
STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">5.6 <U>Taxes.</U> All payments due under this Agreement shall be paid in full without deduction, except for taxes (if any) required to be withheld by
applicable law in Territory A with respect to such payments. In the event the SNC Partnership is required under applicable law to withhold any tax to the revenue authorities in any country in Territory A regarding any payment to Sanofi and/or BMS,
the amount of such tax shall be deducted by the SNC Partnership and paid to the relevant revenue authority, and the SNC Partnership shall notify the relevant Party thereof and shall promptly furnish to such Party all copies of any tax certificate or
other documentation evidencing such withholding. In the event that any such tax shall subsequently be found to be due, payment of such tax shall be the responsibility of Sanofi or BMS, as the case may be. </FONT></P> <P
STYLE="margin-top:18px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>ARTICLE 6 </B></FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>LICENSE STEERING
COMMITTEE </B></FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">6.1 <U>License Steering Committee.</U> In order to ensure the proper use of the Developed Know-How by the SNC Partnership
for the commercialization and further development of the Products, Sanofi and BMS shall be represented by a License Steering Committee (the &#147;<U>License Steering Committee</U>&#148;), which shall be responsible for the following decisions
(collectively, the &#147;<U>License Strategic Decisions</U>&#148;): </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">(i) recommended Product profiles, claim structures and dosages for
file submissions using the form set forth in <U>Exhibit 6.1 -A</U> attached hereto; </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">(ii) the core positioning strategies and key messages
with respect to the commercialization of the Products using the form set forth in <U>Exhibit 6.1-B</U> attached hereto; </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">(iii) approval of
the centrally funded budget for certain programs and expenses using the form set forth in <U>Exhibit 6.1 -C</U> attached hereto; </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">(iv)
overall pricing guidelines using the form set forth in <U>Exhibit 6.1-D </U>attached hereto; and </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">(v) overall strategy and expenses for
Phase IIIB studies, differentiation programs and studies for New Indications and Line Extensions using the form set forth in <U>Exhibit 6<I>.</I>1-E</U> attached hereto. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;
</FONT></P>
 <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">* CONFIDENTIAL TREATMENT REQUESTED. CONFIDENTIAL PORTION HAS BEEN FILED </FONT></P> <P
STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">SEPARATELY WITH THE SECURITIES AND EXCHANGE COMMISSION </FONT></P>


<p Style='page-break-before:always'>
<HR  SIZE="3" COLOR="#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">


 <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="right"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">
 10
 </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
 <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">6.2 <U>License Functional Committees.</U> Subject to the general oversight and authority of the
License Steering Committee, the following functional committees (the &#147;<U>License Functional Committees&#148;)</U> are hereby established and shall be maintained and empowered as hereinafter provided: (i)&nbsp;a marketing working group (the
&#147;<U>Marketing Working Group</U>&#148;), (ii)&nbsp;a development committee (the &#147;<U>Development Committee&#148;)</U> and (iii)&nbsp;a regulatory committee (the &#147;<U>Regulatory Committee</U>&#148;). </FONT></P> <P
STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">6.3 <U>Marketing Working Group.</U> (a)&nbsp;The Marketing Working Group shall be responsible for (i)&nbsp;developing and seeking approval for the
centrally funded budget for certain programs and expenses using the form set forth in Exhibit 6.1-C attached hereto, (ii)&nbsp;implementing such centrally funded budget, (iii)&nbsp;allocating marketing responsibilities among Sanofi, BMS and their
respective Affiliates under such centrally funded budget, (iv)&nbsp;the modification or substitution (if any) of the trademarks for the Products set forth in Schedule 5.07(b) of the Alliance Support Agreement, (v)&nbsp;developing and coordinating
opinion leader support in Territory A, (vi)&nbsp;analyzing the competitive market and developing centrally funded programs to implement differentiation strategies in Territory A, (vii)&nbsp;directing centrally funded market and outcomes research,
(viii)&nbsp;directing Product-related public relations and communications strategies and (ix)&nbsp;monitoring the sales of the Products and each Product&#146;s market share in Territory A. The Marketing Working Group shall report and make its
recommendations to the License Steering Committee. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">(b) The Marketing Working Group also shall be responsible for developing and ensuring
the implementation of the Territory-wide centrally funded marketing plan for each Product, and for ensuring that such plan is accurately and fully communicated to the local entities. Within the Marketing Working Group, Sanofi shall have the Lead for
Clopidogrel Products and BMS shall have the Lead for Irbesartan Products; <I>provided, however, </I>that, notwithstanding the above, all recommendations and decisions made by the Marketing Working Group shall be jointly made pursuant to
Section&nbsp;6.6(b) hereof. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">6.4 <U>Development Committee.</U> The Development Committee shall be responsible for (i)&nbsp;implementing the
decisions made by the License Steering Committee, (ii)&nbsp;establishing the general strategy for New Indications and Line Extensions and (iii)&nbsp;overseeing the development of New Indications and Line Extensions, if such development is conducted
jointly by Sanofi and BMS or their respective Affiliates. Within the Development Committee, Sanofi shall have the Lead for Clopidogrel Products and BMS shall have the Lead for Irbesartan Products; <I>provided, however, </I>that, notwithstanding the
above, all recommendations and decisions made by the Development Committee shall be jointly made pursuant to Section&nbsp;6.6(b) hereof. The Development Committee shall report and make its recommendations to the License Steering Committee.
</FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">6.5 <U>Regulatory Committee</U>. The Regulatory Committee shall be responsible for (i)&nbsp;implementing the decisions made by the License
Steering Committee, (ii)&nbsp;the optimal regulatory filing strategies for the Products, (iii)&nbsp;developing and implementing the regulatory plan for the Products, (iv)&nbsp;liaison activities with regulatory authorities during the development and
initial file review through approval or registration in each country for the Products, (v)&nbsp;regulatory activities relating to the development, approval and registration of New Indications and Line Extensions for the Products and
(vi)&nbsp;coordinating activities related to post-approval safety and surveillance of the Products. Within the Regulatory Committee, Sanofi shall have the </FONT>
</P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
 <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">* CONFIDENTIAL TREATMENT REQUESTED. CONFIDENTIAL PORTION HAS BEEN FILED </FONT></P> <P
STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">SEPARATELY WITH THE SECURITIES AND EXCHANGE COMMISSION </FONT></P>


<p Style='page-break-before:always'>
<HR  SIZE="3" COLOR="#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">


 <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="right"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">
 11
 </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
 <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">
<FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">Lead for Clopidogrel Products and BMS shall have the Lead for Irbesartan Products; <I>provided, however, </I>that, notwithstanding the above, all
recommendations and decisions made by the Regulatory Committee shall be jointly made pursuant to Section&nbsp;6.6(b) hereof. The Regulatory Committee shall report and make its recommendations to the License Steering Committee. </FONT></P> <P
STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">6.6 <U>Committee Composition and Decision Making.</U> (a)&nbsp;The License Steering Committee shall at all times consist of six (6)&nbsp;representatives,
three (3)&nbsp;of whom shall represent Sanofi and three (3)&nbsp;of whom shall represent BMS. The representatives of Sanofi shall be the persons serving from time to time as the (i)&nbsp;President and Executive Director, Sanofi Pharma
(ii)&nbsp;Senior Vice President, Strategy, Sanofi Pharma and (iii)&nbsp;Vice President, Alliance Management, Sanofi Pharma. The representatives of BMS shall be the persons serving from to time as the (i)&nbsp;President, Worldwide Medicines Group
(ii)&nbsp;Senior Vice President, Worldwide Franchise Management and (iii)&nbsp;Vice President, Alliance Management. If any such position has been modified or eliminated, the Party so affected shall appoint an individual whose position is
substantially similar to the position so modified or eliminated. The License Steering Committee shall have the sole power, by a consensus of the representatives of Sanofi and BMS, to make any and all License Strategic Decisions and to resolve any
deadlock or conflict arising among or within the License Functional Committees that has not been resolved pursuant to the Alliance Support Agreement. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT
FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">(b) Each of the Marketing Working Group, the Development Committee and the Regulatory Committee shall at all times consist of any equal number of representatives of Sanofi and BMS. All representatives of each License
Functional Committee shall be senior management personnel of Sanofi and BMS, respectively, or of their respective Affiliates. All recommendations and decisions made by each License Functional Committee shall be made by a consensus of the
representatives of Sanofi and BMS thereon. Each License Functional Committee shall be authorized only to make recommendations to the License Steering Committee unless, and only to the extent that, it shall have received a specific written delegation
of greater authority from the License Steering Committee pursuant to Section&nbsp;6.9 hereof; <I>provided, however, </I>that each License Functional Committee shall have the authority, by a consensus of the representatives of Sanofi and BMS thereon,
to make decisions on issues within such License Functional Committee&#146;s specified scope of responsibilities as set forth in Sections 6.3-6.5 hereof, respectively. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT
FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">6.7 <U>Committee Dispute Resolution.</U> All disputes arising within the License Steering Committee, within any License Functional Committee or among the License Functional Committees shall be resolved pursuant to
Section&nbsp;3.06 of the Alliance Support Agreement; <I>provided, however, </I>that if agreement cannot be reached with respect to [*] programs and expenses for any fiscal year pursuant to Section&nbsp;3.06 of the Alliance Support Agreement, [*]
programs and expenses for the previous fiscal year shall carry over to the next fiscal year, until [*] programs and expenses for the next fiscal year shall have been approved. </FONT></P> <P
STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">6.8 <U>Cross-Territory Issues</U>. The License Steering Committee or any License Functional Committee may agree with its counterpart committee in
Territory B that certain studies, programs or plans will benefit the commercialization or development of the Products in Territory A as well as Territory B. In such case, such committee shall negotiate in good faith with its counterpart committee in
Territory B to allocate any expenses related to such studies, </FONT>
</P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
 <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">* CONFIDENTIAL TREATMENT REQUESTED. CONFIDENTIAL PORTION HAS BEEN FILED </FONT></P> <P
STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">SEPARATELY WITH THE SECURITIES AND EXCHANGE COMMISSION </FONT></P>


<p Style='page-break-before:always'>
