 <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="right"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">
 12
 </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
 <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">
<FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">programs of plans between the two Territories, with the expectation that, unless otherwise agreed, such expenses shall be [*]. </FONT></P> <P
STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">6.9 <U>Delegation.</U> The License Steering Committee may, by a consensus of the representatives of Sanofi and BMS thereon, expressly and by written
resolution establish any other functional committee and delegate its powers to such newly established functional committee and/or to any then existing License Functional Committee on such terms as it deems appropriate. </FONT></P> <P
STYLE="margin-top:18px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>ARTICLE 7 </B></FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>NEW INDICATION OR LINE
EXTENSION </B></FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>SOLE RISK SCENARIO </B></FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT
FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">7.1 <U>Sole Development.</U> If either Sanofi or BMS wishes to pursue the development of any New Indication or Line Extension, such Party (the &#147;<U>Proposing Party</U>&#148;&#145;) shall propose such development
to the other Party (the &#147;<U>Other Party</U>&#148;) in the context of the Development Committee. If the Other Party decides not to pursue such development, as evidenced by its negative vote in the Development Committee with respect to such
development and irrespective of whether such Party has the Lead for the Product with respect to which such development is proposed, then the Development Committee shall submit such proposal to the License Steering Committee, which shall decide
whether the Proposing Party may proceed alone with such development. If the License Steering Committee agrees to permit such sole development, the Proposing Party shall be entitled to undertake such development at its sole cost and expense.
</FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">7.2 <U>Commercialization of Resulting Products.</U> If the Proposing Party proceeds alone with such development pursuant to
Section&nbsp;7.1 hereof, the Proposing Party and the Other Party shall, and shall cause their respective Affiliates, to grant the rights for the development of such New Indication or Line Extension, as the case may be, to the Proposing Party (with
the right to sub-license to its Affiliates with the consent of the Other Party (which such consent shall not be unreasonably withheld)) solely for the purposes of pursuing such development in accordance with the terms of this Agreement. In the event
the Proposing Party successfully develops such New Indication or Line Extension, the Proposing Party hereby acknowledges and agrees that (i)&nbsp;pursuant to Section&nbsp;2.1 hereof, solely the SNC Partnership shall have the right to commercialize
such New Indication or Line Extension in Territory A and (ii)&nbsp;such commercialization shall be fully subject to and performed in accordance with the decisions and recommendations of the Alliance Strategic Committee, the License Steering
Committee and the Functional Committees in accordance with this Agreement and the Alliance Support Agreement. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">7.3 [*]<U>.</U> In the event
of such sole development, the Proposing Party shall be entitled to receive [*] for such development equal to [*], which shall be [*] payable to such Party pursuant to Article 5 hereof. In the event that the Finance Committee cannot agree upon a
method of [*], including the [*] under Section [*] hereof, </FONT>
</P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
 <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">* CONFIDENTIAL TREATMENT REQUESTED. CONFIDENTIAL PORTION HAS BEEN FILED </FONT></P> <P
STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">SEPARATELY WITH THE SECURITIES AND EXCHANGE COMMISSION </FONT></P>

 <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="right"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">
 13
 </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
 <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">
<FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">the Proposing Party and the Other Party shall [*]. The [*], and the fees and expenses of [*] shall be [*]. </FONT></P> <P
STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">7.4 <U>Election to Participate in Development</U>. The Other Party may reverse its election not to pursue such development, by Notice to the Proposing
Party, at any time prior to the registration of such New Indication or Line Extension in the first country in Territory A in which registration is made, subject to the reimbursement of [*] of [*] costs incurred by the Proposing Party with respect to
such New Indication or Line Extension as of the date on which such Notice is made. In the event of such reimbursement, the Proposing Party and the Other Party shall thereafter share [*] costs incurred after the date on which such Notice is made with
respect to such development, and the [*] set forth in Section [*] hereof shall be [*] by [*], from [*] to [*]of Net Sales of such Product in Territory A attributable to such New Indication or Line Extension; <I>provided, however, </I>that only the
Proposing Party shall be entitled to [*]. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">7.5 <U>Period of Exclusivity.</U> If the development undertaken by the Proposing Party results
in (i)&nbsp;an additional period of legal and <I>de facto </I>exclusivity for either Product as a whole or (ii)&nbsp;the issuance of a new patent for such New Indication or Line Extension developed through such development resulting in legal and
<I>de facto </I>exclusivity for such New Indication or Line Extension, then the Proposing Party also shall be entitled to [*] for additional development determined by the Finance Committee, which shall not be less than [*] nor more than [*] of Net
Sales of such Product in Territory A attributable to the New Indication or Line Extension. [*] shall be payable in accordance with Article 5 hereof (x)&nbsp;after the date legal or <I>de facto </I>exclusivity of such Product would otherwise have
ended until the date on which the legal or <I>de facto </I>exclusivity obtained as a result of the sole development terminates (whichever terminates first), in the case referred to in clause (i)&nbsp;above, and (y)&nbsp;during the life of the
relevant patent, in the case referred to in clause (ii)&nbsp;above. This [*] shall not exceed [*] of Net Sales of such Product in Territory A, even if the conditions in both clauses (i)&nbsp;and (ii)&nbsp;above are satisfied, and shall not be
reduced even if the Other Party exercises its right under Section&nbsp;7.4 hereof to reverse its election not to participate in such development. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman"
SIZE="2">7.6 <U>Safety and Other Problems</U>. Notwithstanding anything to the contrary in this Article 7 or in Section&nbsp;7.05(b) of the Alliance Support Agreement, if either Sanofi or BMS determines that the development of a New Indication or
Line Extension should be suspended for a safety reason that it believes in good faith justifies such suspension, or reasonably believes that such development would have a material adverse effect on the overall development of Irbesartan or
Clopidogrel, as the case may be, or the overall commercial viability of the resulting Product(s), such Party shall have the unilateral right to veto the development by the other Party of such New Indication or Line Extension. </FONT></P> <P
STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
 <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">* CONFIDENTIAL TREATMENT REQUESTED. CONFIDENTIAL PORTION HAS BEEN FILED </FONT></P> <P

 <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="right"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">
 14
 </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
 <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>ARTICLE 8 </B></FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT
FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>ADVERSE EVENT REPORTING </B></FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">8.1 <U>Adverse Event Reporting.</U> BMS, Sanofi and the SNC Partnership
shall each ensure that, in the marketing of the Products in Territory A, it and each of its respective Affiliates record, investigate, summarize and review all Adverse Events and Serious Adverse Events. Each Party shall require that its Affiliates,
sub-licensees and distributors adhere to all requirements of local law which relate to the reporting and investigation of Adverse Events and Serious Adverse Events, and each Party shall require that its Affiliates, sub-licensees and distributors
keep such Party informed of such experiences. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">8.2 <U>Reporting Procedure.</U> In order that each Party may be fully informed of these
experiences each Party shall report: </FONT></P> <P STYLE="font-size:6px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P>

Pharma </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:8%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">82, avenue Raspail </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:8%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman"
SIZE="2">94255 Gentilly Cedex, France </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:8%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">Attention: [omitted] </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:8%"><FONT
FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">Facsimile: [omitted] </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">all Adverse Events and Serious Adverse Events anywhere in the world; <I>provided, however, </I>that
Serious Adverse Events shall be reported to the relevant Person within three (3)&nbsp;working days of a Party&#146;s becoming aware of such an event (a &#147;<U>Reporting Party</U>&#148;) and shall be reported by facsimile as provided above. The
Reporting Party shall report all other Adverse Events on a monthly basis. The Parties shall agree on an Adverse Event reporting form that may be used by the Reporting Party as a basis for such reports. Each Party shall promptly notify the relevant
Person of any complaint received by it in sufficient detail and in sufficient time to allow such Person to comply with any and all regulatory requirements imposed upon it in any country. Each Party shall also advise the relevant Person of any
regulatory developments (<I>e.g., </I>proposed recalls, labeling and other registrational dossier changes, etc.) affecting such Product in any country in Territory A. Each Party shall have the right to review and/or request copies of any and all
information and reporting forms generated or received by the relevant Person with respect to Adverse Events and Serious Adverse Events. These procedures may be modified from time to time by the Regulatory Committee. </FONT></P> <P
STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P>

 <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="right"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">
 15
 </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
 <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>ARTICLE 9 </B></FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT
FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>TERM; TERMINATION </B></FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">9.1 <U>Term: Termination.</U> (a)&nbsp;The term of this Agreement, with respect
to each Product, shall commence on the date hereof and shall expire on the later of (x)&nbsp;the 15th anniversary of the first commercial sale of such Product and (y)&nbsp;such date as the last patent relating to such Product effective in any
country in Territory A shall have expired <U>and</U> all other <I>de jure </I>exclusivity available for such Product shall have ended. Thereafter, the term of this Agreement may be renewed with respect to such Product for successive three-year
terms, respectively, by the mutual agreement of the Parties no later than 24 months prior to the expiration of the term then in effect. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman"
SIZE="2">(b) Notwithstanding the foregoing, this Agreement shall automatically expire upon the earlier of (i)&nbsp;the termination by both Parties of the commercialization of both Products throughout Territory A as the result of a Safety Problem
pursuant to Section&nbsp;7.04(ii) of the Alliance Support Agreement and (ii)&nbsp;the exercise by BMS of the special put option pursuant to Section&nbsp;7.08 of the Alliance Support Agreement. </FONT></P> <P
STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">(c) The Parties may cause the early termination of this Agreement by the mutual written consent of each of the Parties. </FONT></P> <P
STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">(d) Either BMS or Sanofi shall have the right to declare termination of this Agreement upon Notice to the other Parties, following the first to occur of:
</FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">(i) such other Party shall have (A)&nbsp;voluntarily commenced any proceeding or filed any petition seeking relief under Title 11 of the
United States Code, French Law No.&nbsp;84-148 of March&nbsp;1, 1984, French Law No.&nbsp;85-98 of January&nbsp;25, 1985 or any other bankruptcy, insolvency or similar law of the United States, any state thereof, the French Republic or any other
applicable jurisdiction, (B)&nbsp;applied for or consented to the appointment of a receiver, trustee, custodian, sequestrator, conciliator, administrator or similar official for it or for all or substantially all of its property, (C)&nbsp;filed an
answer admitting the material allegations of a petition filed against or in respect of it in any such proceeding, (D)&nbsp;made a general assignment for the benefit of creditors of all or substantially all of its assets, (E)&nbsp;become unable
generally, or admitted in writing its inability to, pay all or substantially all of its debts as they become due or (F)&nbsp;taken corporate action for the purpose of effecting any of the foregoing; or </FONT></P> <P
STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">(ii) an involuntary proceeding shall have been commenced or any involuntary petition shall have been filed in a court of competent jurisdiction seeking
(A)&nbsp;relief in respect of such other Party, or of its property, under Title 11 of the United States Code, French Law No.&nbsp;84-148 of March&nbsp;1, 1984, French Law No.&nbsp;85-98 of January&nbsp;25, 1985 or any other bankruptcy, insolvency or
similar law of the United States, any state thereof, the French Republic or any other applicable jurisdiction, (B)&nbsp;the appointment of a receiver, trustee, custodian, sequestrator, conciliator, administrator or similar official for such other
Party or for all or substantially all of its property or (C)&nbsp;the winding-up or liquidation of such other Party; and such proceeding or petition shall have continued undismissed for sixty (60)&nbsp;days or an order or decree approving or
ordering any of the foregoing shall have continued unstayed and in effect for thirty (30)&nbsp;days. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
 <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">* CONFIDENTIAL TREATMENT REQUESTED. CONFIDENTIAL PORTION HAS BEEN FILED </FONT></P> <P
STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">SEPARATELY WITH THE SECURITIES AND EXCHANGE COMMISSION </FONT></P>


<p Style='page-break-before:always'>
<HR  SIZE="3" COLOR="#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">


 <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="right"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">
 16
 </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
 <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">9.2 <U>Consequences of Termination.</U> (a)&nbsp;Upon the expiration or early termination of this
Agreement pursuant to Section&nbsp;9.1 hereof (the &#147;<U>License Termination Date</U>&#148;): </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">(i) the terms and conditions of
Section&nbsp;7.07 of the Alliance Support Agreement shall apply, except in the event of early termination pursuant to Section&nbsp;9.1(b) hereof; </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman"
SIZE="2">(ii) the SNC Partnership shall cease, and shall cause each sub-licensee (if any) to cease, all activities related to the Developed Know-How; and </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT
FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">(iii) the SNC Partnership shall pay in full all amounts due to Sanofi and/or BMS hereunder within ten (10)&nbsp;days after the final determination of Net Sales for such period, including the License Termination Date,
pursuant to Sections 5.2, 5.3 and 5.5 hereof which shall survive until the full payment of all amounts under this clause (iii). </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">(b) In the
event of the termination of the commercialization of any Product throughout Territory A pursuant to Section&nbsp;7.04 of the Alliance Support Agreement (other than a bilateral termination of such Product as the result of a Safety Problem), the
provisions of Section&nbsp;9.2(a)(ii)-(iii)&nbsp;hereof shall apply, <I>mutatis mutandis, </I>with respect to such Product. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">(c) In the
event of the termination of the commercialization of any Product in any country(ies) of Territory A pursuant to Section&nbsp;7.02 of the Alliance Support Agreement: </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT
FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">(i) the terms and conditions of Section&nbsp;9-2(a)(ii)-(iii)&nbsp;hereof shall apply, <I>mutatis mutandis, </I>with respect to such Product in such country(ies); and </FONT></P> <P
STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">(ii) all rights and licenses granted by Sanofi and BMS hereunder with respect to such Product in such country(ies) shall revert to Sanofi and BMS,
respectively, subject to Section&nbsp;7.03 of the Alliance Support Agreement. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">(d) Expiration or early termination of this Agreement
pursuant to this Article 9 shall be without prejudice to any rights which shall have accrued to the benefit of any Party prior to such expiration or termination. Such expiration or termination shall not relieve any Party from its obligations which
are expressly indicated to survive the expiration or termination of this Agreement. All of the Parties&#146; rights and obligations under this subclause (d)&nbsp;and under Sections 5.4, 5.6, 8.1, 8.2, 9.2 and 11.2-11.4 and Article 10 hereof shall
survive such expiration or termination for the applicable period. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:18px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>ARTICLE 10 </B></FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"
ALIGN="center"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>CONFIDENTIALITY </B></FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">All of the data, material and information exchanged by the
Parties hereunder or related hereto (including, without limitation, the Developed Know-How) shall be subject to the confidentiality provisions of the Alliance Support Agreement as set forth in Section&nbsp;5.03 thereof. </FONT></P> <P
STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
 <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">* CONFIDENTIAL TREATMENT REQUESTED. CONFIDENTIAL PORTION HAS BEEN FILED </FONT></P> <P
STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">SEPARATELY WITH THE SECURITIES AND EXCHANGE COMMISSION </FONT></P>

&#147;Notices&#148;) shall be in writing, shall be in the English language and shall be given or made by delivery in person, by courier service, by facsimile (with receipt confirmed) or by registered or certified mail (return receipt requested, with

<p Style='page-break-before:always'>
<HR  SIZE="3" COLOR="#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">


 <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="right"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">
 19
 </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
 <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:8%">
<FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">delivered by hand or overnight courier service or sent by facsimile, or on the date ten (10)&nbsp;business days after dispatch by certified or registered
mail (postage prepaid) if mailed. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">11.2 <U>Governing Law.</U> This Agreement shall be governed by and construed in accordance with the laws
of the State of New York, United States of America, without regard to the choice of law principles that might otherwise be applied in such jurisdiction. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT
FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">11.3 <U>Dispute Resolution.</U> All disputes between the Parties arising in connection with this Agreement (other than those specifically referred to in Sections 5.5, 6.7 or 7.3 hereof) shall be finally settled under
the Rules of Conciliation and Arbitration of the International Chamber of Commerce, and the number of arbitrators shall be three. Each of Sanofi (acting on its own behalf and on behalf of the SNC Partnership) and BMS shall designate one arbitrator
and the two so appointed arbitrators shall jointly designate the third arbitrator. If such designation is not made within fifteen days of the designation of the second party designated arbitrator, the Secretary General of the International Court of
Arbitration of the International Chamber of Commerce shall designate the third arbitrator. The proceedings shall be conducted in the English language in Paris, France. The president of any arbitral tribunal shall not be a citizen of either the
United States of America or the French Republic. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">11.4 <U>Specific Performance.</U> Each Party agrees that the Developed Know-How is
unique, and that a failure by any Party to perform its obligations under this Agreement will result in irreparable damage and that specific performance of such obligations may be obtained without the posting of any bond or other security;
<I>provided, however, </I>that the powers of the arbitrators under this Section&nbsp;11.4 shall be limited to enforcing the obligations provided for in this Agreement as drafted. </FONT></P> <P
STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">11.5 <U>No Third Party Beneficiaries</U>. This Agreement shall be binding upon and inure solely to the benefit of the Parties (including the partners of
the SNC Partnership, each in its capacity as partner thereof) and permitted sub-licensees and assigns, and nothing herein, express or implied, is intended to, or shall confer upon, any other Person any legal or equitable right, benefit or remedy of
any nature whatsoever. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">11.6 <U>Assignment</U> (a)&nbsp;This Agreement may be assigned by a Party only to an Affiliate of Sanofi or BMS in
the event of a corporate reorganization (including an entity that becomes an Affiliate in connection with such reorganization) involving the assumption of all or substantially all of such Party&#146;s marketing or manufacturing functions in
Territory A by such Affiliate, in which event the rights may be assigned and the obligations may be delegated to such Affiliate. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">(b)
Notwithstanding anything to the contrary contained in subclause (a)&nbsp;above, this Agreement may be assigned, in whole or in part, by, or on behalf of, the SNC Partnership as a result of a termination event under either Section&nbsp;7.04 or
Section&nbsp;7.06 of the Alliance Support Agreement or as a result of the dissolution of the SNC Partnership (other than for a Safety Problem), and in any such event shall be deemed to be amended and restated (i)&nbsp;to delete Sections 2.4, 2.5,
3.2 and 6.1-6.9 and Articles <I>7 </I>and 10 hereof, as well as any reference to the Alliance Support Agreement and (ii)&nbsp;to insert those terms and conditions that are then customary in the pharmaceutical industry for an intellectual property
license agreement, including, without limitation, provisions for confidentiality, indemnification and termination for </FONT>
</P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
 <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">* CONFIDENTIAL TREATMENT REQUESTED. CONFIDENTIAL PORTION HAS BEEN FILED </FONT></P> <P
STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">SEPARATELY WITH THE SECURITIES AND EXCHANGE COMMISSION </FONT></P>


<p Style='page-break-before:always'>
<HR  SIZE="3" COLOR="#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">


 <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="right"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">
 20
 </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
 <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">
<FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">material breach, as well as a diligence requirement that the assignee shall use reasonable commercial efforts to actively promote the Product(s) assigned
(and the remedy for breach of such diligence requirement shall be termination of such amended and restated agreement), </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">11.7
<U>Severability.</U> If any term or other provision hereof is held to be invalid, illegal or incapable of being enforced by applicable law or public policy, all other terms and provisions hereof shall nevertheless remain in full force and effect so
long as the economic effect or legal substance of the transactions contemplated hereby is not affected in any manner materially adverse to any Party. Upon such determination that any term or other provision is invalid, illegal or incapable of being
enforced, the Parties shall negotiate in good faith to modify this Agreement so as to effect the original intent of the Parties as closely as possible in an acceptable manner in order that the transactions contemplated hereby are consummated as
originally contemplated to the greatest extent possible. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">11.8 <U>Waivers and Amendments.</U> No modification of or amendment to this
Agreement shall be valid unless in a writing signed by the Parties referring specifically to this Agreement and starting the Parties&#146; intention to modify or amend the same. Any waiver of any term or condition of this Agreement shall be in a
writing signed by the Party sought to be charged with such waiver referring specifically to the term or condition to be waived, and no such waiver shall be deemed to constitute the waiver of any other breach of the same or of any other provision
hereof. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">11.9 <U>Headings.</U> All titles and captions contained in this Agreement are for the convenience of reference only and shall not
affect in any way the meaning or interpretation hereof. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">11.10 <U>Entire Agreement.</U> This Agreement and the Alliance Support Agreement
constitute the entire agreement of the Parties with respect to the subject matter contained herein and all prior agreements relative thereto which are not contained herein are hereby terminated. </FONT></P> <P
STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">11.11 <U>No Partnership or Joint Venture.</U> This Agreement is not intended to create, and nothing contained herein shall be construed to create an
association, joint venture, trust or partnership, or to impose a trust or partnership covenant, obligation or liability on or with regard to the other Party. Each Party shall be severally responsible for its own covenants, obligations and
liabilities as herein provided. Other than the SNC Partnership: (i)&nbsp;no Party shall be under the control of, or shall be deemed to control any other Party; (ii)&nbsp;no Party is the legal representative, agent, joint venturer or employee of the
other Party with respect to this Agreement for any purpose whatsoever, and no Party shall have the right or power to bind the other Party; and (iii)&nbsp;no Party has the right or authority to assume or create any obligations of any kind or to make
any representation or warranty on behalf of any other Party, whether express or implied, of to bind any other Party in any respect whatsoever. The provisions of this Agreement are intended only for the regulation of relations between the Parties.
This Agreement is not intended for the benefit of non-Party creditors, and no rights are granted to.non-Party creditors under this Agreement. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman"
SIZE="2">11.12 <U>Governing Language.</U> The Parties acknowledge that this Agreement may be translated into the French language. The Parties agree that this English language version shall in all respects be the controlling version of this
Agreement. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
 <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">* CONFIDENTIAL TREATMENT REQUESTED. CONFIDENTIAL PORTION HAS BEEN FILED </FONT></P> <P
STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">SEPARATELY WITH THE SECURITIES AND EXCHANGE COMMISSION </FONT></P>


<p Style='page-break-before:always'>
<HR  SIZE="3" COLOR="#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">


 <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="right"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">
 21
 </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
 <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">11.13 <U>Counterparts.</U> This Agreement may be executed in one or more counterparts, each of which
when executed shall be deemed to be an original, but <I>all </I>of which when taken together shall constitute one and the same agreement. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman"
SIZE="2">IN WITNESS WHEREOF, the Parties have duly executed this Agreement as of the day and year first written above. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="font-size:12px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P>

<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">1</FONT></TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">Territory A will be deemed to include any new country created by the division, consolidation or name change of the countries listed below. </FONT></TD></TR></TABLE> <P

 <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B><U>EXHIBIT 6.1-D </U></B></FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px"
ALIGN="center"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B><U>OVERALL PRICING GUIDELINES</U></B> </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">Description: Range and rationale for recommended pricing
guidelines </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:18px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B><U>PRODUCT</U>:
<U>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</U> </B></FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">Overall pricing
guidelines: </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">Rationale: </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:8%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">Comparative
competitive products: </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:8%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">Market conditions: </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:8%"><FONT
FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">Product differentiation: </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:8%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">Other: </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT
SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
 <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">* CONFIDENTIAL TREATMENT REQUESTED. CONFIDENTIAL PORTION HAS BEEN FILED </FONT></P> <P
STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">SEPARATELY WITH THE SECURITIES AND EXCHANGE COMMISSION </FONT></P>


<p Style='page-break-before:always'>
<HR  SIZE="3" COLOR="#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">


 <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
 <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B><U>EXHIBIT 6.1-E </U></B></FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px"
ALIGN="center"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B><U>PHASE IIIB STUDIES, DIFFERENTIATION PROGRAMS </U></B></FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B><U>AND STUDIES FOR NEW
INDICATIONS AND LINE EXTENSIONS </U></B></FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">Description: </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman"

<TITLE>Product Know-How License Agmt</TITLE>

 <BODY BGCOLOR="WHITE">

 <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="right"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>Exhibit 10.11 </B></FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT
FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">* CONFIDENTIAL TREATMENT REQUESTED. CONFIDENTIAL PORTION HAS BEEN FILED </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">SEPARATELY WITH THE SECURITIES AND
EXCHANGE COMMISSION </FONT></P> <P STYLE="font-size:12px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P> <P STYLE="line-height:0px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:2px;border-bottom:0.5pt solid #000000">&nbsp;</P> <P
STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">PRODUCT KNOW-HOW LICENSE AGREEMENT </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">among
</FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">SANOFI </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">BRISTOL-MYERS SQUIBB
COMPANY </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">and </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">BRISTOL-MYERS
SQUIBB SANOFI PHARMACEUTICALS HOLDING PARTNERSHIP </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">dated as of January&nbsp;1, 1997 </FONT></P> <P

 <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">* CONFIDENTIAL TREATMENT REQUESTED. CONFIDENTIAL PORTION HAS BEEN FILED </FONT></P> <P
STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">SEPARATELY WITH THE SECURITIES AND EXCHANGE COMMISSION </FONT></P>


<p Style='page-break-before:always'>
<HR  SIZE="3" COLOR="#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">


 <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
 <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">This PRODUCT KNOW-HOW LICENSE AGREEMENT (this &#147;<U>Agreement</U>&#148;) dated as of
January&nbsp;1,1997 is hereby made by and among: </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">Sanofi, a <I>soci&eacute;t&eacute; anonyme </I>organized and existing under the laws of
the French Republic (&#147;<U>Sanofi</U>&#148;): </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">Bristol-Myers Squibb Company, a corporation organized and existing under the laws of the
State of Delaware, United States of America (&#147;<U>BMS</U>&#148;); and </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">Bristol-Myers Squibb Sanofi Pharmaceuticals Holding Partnership,
a Delaware partnership (the &#147;<U>Partnership</U>&#148; and, together with Sanofi and BMS, the &#147;<U>Parties</U>&#148; and, individually, each a &#147;<U>Party</U>&#148;). </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:18px;margin-bottom:0px"
ALIGN="center"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B><U>W I T N E S S E T H: </U></B></FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">WHEREAS, Sanofi has discovered and patented two
new chemical entities, one known as SR 47436 with the international non-proprietary name Irbesartan (&#147;<U>Irbesartan</U>&#148;) and one known as SR 25990C with the international non-proprietary name Clopidogrel Hydrogenosulphate
(&#147;<U>Clopidogrel</U>&#148;), with potential ethical pharmaceutical applications in the cardiovascular therapeutic field; </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">WHEREAS,
Sanofi, BMS and Sterling Winthrop Inc., a Delaware corporation (&#147;Sterling&#148;) entered into a Development Agreement dated July&nbsp;29, 1993 (the &#147;<U>Development Agreement</U>&#148;) for, among other things, the development of Irbesartan
and Clopidogrel; </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">WHEREAS, pursuant to an Amended and Restated Asset Purchase Agreement dated as of September&nbsp;30,1994 among Eastman
Kodak Company, Sanofi and Sterling, Sanofi acquired certain assets, and assumed certain obligations, of the ethical pharmaceutical business of Sterling, including the rights and obligations of Sterling under the Development Agreement; </FONT></P> <P
STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">WHEREAS, Sanofi and BMS have entered into a Territory B Alliance Support Agreement dated as of the date hereof (the &#147;<U>Alliance Support
Agreement</U>&#148;) and have formed through their indirect wholly owned subsidiaries the Partnership pursuant to the partnership agreement dated as of the date hereof (the &#147;<U>Partnership Agreement</U>&#148;) for, among other things, the
commercialization of the Products in Territory B (as such terms are defined herein); </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">WHEREAS, Sanofi and the Partnership have entered into
an Irbesartan Intellectual Property License Agreement (the &#147;<U>Irbesartan License Agreement</U>&#148;) and a Clopidogrel Intellectual Property License and Supply Agreement dated as of the date hereof, pursuant to which Sanofi has granted a
license to use certain patents, trademarks and know-how for the commercialization of the Products in Territory B that neither were developed with nor are owned by BMS; </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;
</FONT></P>
 <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">* CONFIDENTIAL TREATMENT REQUESTED. CONFIDENTIAL PORTION HAS BEEN FILED </FONT></P> <P
STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">SEPARATELY WITH THE SECURITIES AND EXCHANGE COMMISSION </FONT></P>


<p Style='page-break-before:always'>
<HR  SIZE="3" COLOR="#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">


 <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="right"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">
 2
 </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
 <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">WHEREAS, Sanofi and BMS have developed certain know-how under the Development Agreement for the
commercialization of the Products in Territory B and, as a result, each has an undivided one-half direct ownership interest in the Developed Know-How (as such term is defined herein); and </FONT></P> <P
STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">WHEREAS, Sanofi and BMS are willing to grant to the Partnership, and the Partnership is willing to accept, a license under the Developed Know-How for the
commercialization of the Products in Territory B on the terms and conditions set forth herein. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">NOW, THEREFORE, in consideration of the
mutual covenants and the terms and conditions set forth herein, the Parties hereby agree as follows: </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:18px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>ARTICLE 1 </B></FONT></P> <P
STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>DEFINITIONS </B></FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">1.1 <U>Defined Terms</U>.
As used in this Agreement, the following terms shall have the following meanings: </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">&#147;<U>Adverse Event</U>&#148; means any negative
symptom experienced at the time of or after the taking of any Product of which any Party or any of its Affiliates becomes aware, whether or not considered drug related, including, without limitation, any side effects, injury, toxicity or sensitivity
reaction, or significant failure of expected pharmacological action, as well as instances of symptomatic overdose, abuse or withdrawal reactions. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman"
SIZE="2">&#147;<U>Affiliate</U>&#148;, when used with reference to any Person, means any other Person controlling, controlled by, or under common control with, such Person; <I>provided, however, </I>that, with respect to Sanofi, the definition of
Affiliate shall exclude Elf Aquitaine and any Person not controlled by Sanofi that would be an Affiliate of Sanofi solely by reason of its being controlled by Elf Aquitaine. For the purposes of this definition, &#147;<U>control</U>&#148; shall refer
to the possession, directly or indirectly, of the power to direct the management or policies of a Person or to veto any material decision relating to the management or policies of a Person, in each case whether through the ownership of voting
securities, by contract or otherwise, the beneficial ownership, directly or indirectly, of securities (excluding general partnership interests) representing at least 40% of the voting power of all outstanding voting securities of a Person or
(c)&nbsp;the beneficial ownership of at least 50% of the partnership interests of a general partnership. The Parties confirm that each Co-Promotion Entity (as defined in the Alliance Support Agreement) in Territory B shall be considered to be an
Affiliate of BMS. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">&#147;<U>Alliance Agreements</U>&#148; has the meaning set forth in the Alliance Support Agreement. </FONT></P> <P
STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">&#147;<U>Alliance Strategic Committee</U>&#148; has the meaning set forth in the Alliance Support Agreement. </FONT></P> <P
STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">&#147;<U>Clopidogrel Product</U>&#148; means the product or products having as an active ingredient Clopidogrel or any salt, ester, metabolite or
pro-drug thereof. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
 <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">* CONFIDENTIAL TREATMENT REQUESTED. CONFIDENTIAL PORTION HAS BEEN FILED </FONT></P> <P
STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">SEPARATELY WITH THE SECURITIES AND EXCHANGE COMMISSION </FONT></P>


<p Style='page-break-before:always'>
<HR  SIZE="3" COLOR="#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">


 <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="right"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">
 3
 </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
 <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">&#147;<U>Competing Product</U>&#148; means, with respect to any Product, any other product that [*],
but which is not [*] set forth in Schedule [*] or selected for [*] by [*]. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">&#147;<U>Developed Know-How</U>&#148; means any and all
technical data, information, material and other know-how that relate to the formulation of the Products, including, without limitation, any analytical methodology, chemical, toxicological, pharmacological and clinical data, formulae, procedures,
protocols, techniques and results of experimentation and testing, developed by Sanofi and BMS under the Development Agreement. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman"
SIZE="2">&#147;<U>Finance Committee</U>&#148; has the meaning set forth in the Alliance Support Agreement. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">&#147;<U>Functional
Committee</U>&#148; means any Alliance Functional Committee (as such term is defined in the Alliance Support Agreement) or any License Functional Committee. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT
FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">&#147;<U>Governmental Authority</U>&#148; means any federal, state or local or any foreign or supranational government, governmental, regulatory or administrative authority, agency or commission or any court, tribunal
or judicial or arbitral body. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">&#147;<U>Irbesartan Product</U>&#148; means the product or products having as an active ingredient
Irbesartan or any salt, ester, metabolite or pro-drug thereof. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">&#147;<U>Lead</U>&#148; means the right to initiate proposals and
implement, or cause the implementation of, recommendations and decisions. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">&#147;<U>Line Extension</U>&#148; means, for each Product and
with respect to development conducted on or after January, 1 1997, any new dosage or new form of administration of such Product. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman"
SIZE="2">&#147;<U>MAAs</U>&#148; means, with respect to each Product, any marketing authorizations, licenses, approvals, registrations, certificates and exemptions submitted to or granted by or pending with any Governmental Authority for the purpose
of allowing the manufacture, production, supply, marketing, distribution or sale of such Product in a particular country. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">&#147;<U>Major B
Countries</U>&#148; means any country in Territory B representing at least [*] of aggregate Net Sales of both Products in Territory B, as determined from time to time by [*]. </FONT></P> <P
STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">&#147;<U>Manufacturing and Sourcing Committee</U>&#148; has the meaning set forth in the Alliance Support Agreement. </FONT></P> <P
STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">&#147;<U>Marketing Entity</U>&#148; has the meaning set forth in the Partnership Agreement. </FONT></P> <P
STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">&#147;<U>Net Sales</U>&#148; means for any given period and with respect to any Product, the gross amount invoiced in respect thereof by the Marketing
Entities to any Person (excluding any </FONT>
</P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
 <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">* CONFIDENTIAL TREATMENT REQUESTED. CONFIDENTIAL PORTION HAS BEEN FILED </FONT></P> <P
STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">SEPARATELY WITH THE SECURITIES AND EXCHANGE COMMISSION </FONT></P>


<p Style='page-break-before:always'>
<HR  SIZE="3" COLOR="#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">


 <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="right"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">
 4
 </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
 <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">
<FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">transfers between any Party and its Affiliates solely for purposes of resale, promotional use or clinical trials), <I>less </I>(i)&nbsp;quantity and/or cash
discounts, allowances and/or rebates actually allowed or given, (ii)&nbsp;freight, postage and shipping insurance expenses (if separately identified in such invoice), (iii)&nbsp;sales taxes directly related to the sale to the extent included in the
gross invoice price (but not including taxes assessed against the income derived from such sale) and (iv)&nbsp;amounts repaid or credited on account of rejections, outdating or the return of such Product. </FONT></P> <P
STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">&#147;<U>New Indication</U>&#148; means, for each Product and with respect to development conducted on or after January&nbsp;1, 1997, any new therapeutic
use or application of such Product. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">&#147;<U>Non-Promotional Countries</U>&#148; means the countries in Territory B where the utilization
of personal promotion by sales personnel is not a significant factor in obtaining product usage and achieving sales or where selling is by tender or comparable non-promotional method of sale, as determined from time to time by the Finance Committee.
</FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">&#147;<U>Person</U>&#148; means any individual, partnership, firm, corporation, <I>soci</I>&eacute;<I>t</I>&eacute;<I> anonyme,
soci</I>&eacute;<I>t</I>&eacute;<I> en nom collectif, soci</I>&eacute;<I>t</I>&eacute;<I> en participation, </I>limited liability company, joint venture, association, trust or other entity or any government or any agency or political subdivision
thereof, as well as any syndicate or group that would be deemed to be a person under Section&nbsp;13(d)(3) of the U.S. Securities Exchange Act of 1934, as amended. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT
FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">&#147;<U>Product</U>&#148; means a Clopidogrel Product or an Irbesartan Product and &#147;<U>Products</U>&#148; means both a Clopidogrel Product and an Irbesartan Product. </FONT></P> <P
STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">&#147;<U>Safety Problem</U>&#148; has the meaning set forth in the Alliance Support Agreement. </FONT></P> <P
STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">&#147;<U>Sanofi Pharma</U>&#148; means Sanofi Pharma, a <I>soci</I>&eacute;<I>t</I>&eacute;<I> anonyme </I>organized and existing under the laws of the
French Republic. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><U>&#147;Serious Adverse Event&#148;</U> means any Adverse Event that is life-threatening in that such Adverse Event
places the patient at risk of dying, requires hospitalization, prolongs existing hospitalization or results in permanent disability, birth defect, cancer or death. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT
FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">&#147;<U>Territory</U>&#148; means either Territory A or Territory B and &#147;<U>Territories</U>&#148; means both Territory A and Territory B. </FONT></P> <P
STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">&#147;<U>Territory A</U>&#148; means the countries and geographic areas described and listed in <U>Schedule 1A</U> attached hereto. </FONT></P> <P
STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">&#147;<U>Territory B</U>&#148; means the countries and geographic areas described and listed in <U>Schedule 1 B</U> attached hereto. </FONT></P> <P
STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">&#147;<U>Third Party</U>&#148; means a Person who or which is neither a Party nor an Affiliate of a Party. </FONT></P> <P
STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
 <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">* CONFIDENTIAL TREATMENT REQUESTED. CONFIDENTIAL PORTION HAS BEEN FILED </FONT></P> <P
STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">SEPARATELY WITH THE SECURITIES AND EXCHANGE COMMISSION </FONT></P>

 <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">1.2 <U>Additional Defined Terms.</U> The following additional defined terms shall have the meanings
set forth in the sections of this Agreement listed below: </FONT></P> <P STYLE="font-size:12px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P>
