<TD HEIGHT="8" COLSPAN="2" STYLE="BORDER-LEFT:1px solid #000000; BORDER-TOP:1px solid #000000; BORDER-RIGHT:1px solid #000000">&nbsp;</TD></TR>
<TR>
<TD VALIGN="top" STYLE="BORDER-LEFT:1px solid #000000; padding-left:8px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD VALIGN="bottom" STYLE="BORDER-LEFT:1px solid #000000"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD VALIGN="top" STYLE="BORDER-RIGHT:1px solid #000000; padding-right:8px"> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">in any such training session, the Parties will [*].</FONT></P> <P
STYLE="font-size:6px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:1px">&nbsp;</P></TD></TR>
<TR>
<TD VALIGN="top" STYLE="BORDER-LEFT:1px solid #000000; BORDER-BOTTOM:1px solid #000000; padding-left:8px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD VALIGN="bottom" STYLE="BORDER-LEFT:1px solid #000000; BORDER-BOTTOM:1px solid #000000"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD VALIGN="top" STYLE="BORDER-RIGHT:1px solid #000000; BORDER-BOTTOM:1px solid #000000; padding-right:8px"> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">In addition, BMS shall provide Product-specific training
on the Product for all new and current Otsuka MRs and Otsuka MSLs (to the extent that such MRs and MSLs are part of Otsuka&#146;s Required Resource Commitment set forth in the applicable Annual Commercial Plan). Following such initial training, BMS
shall also make available additional training for all Otsuka MRs and MSLs when BMS provides such additional training for its own sales force representatives on Product. All costs related to such initial and ongoing product-specific training of
Otsuka MRs and MSLs shall be included in Operational Expenses as Indirect Costs.</FONT></P> <P STYLE="font-size:6px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">All
Otsuka and BMS sales representatives shall be subject to a reasonable proficiency examination relevant to Product.</FONT></P> <P STYLE="font-size:6px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT
FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">As Otsuka deploys its MRs in the Co-Promotion effort in the United States, the assignment of each Party&#146;s sales force will be equitable so that the sales force of each Party is assigned valuable, productive
accounts and an equitable share of responsibility for opinion leaders, large accounts and other more desirable accounts and prescribers. Otsuka sales representatives will be geographically dispersed so as to have equitable representation with the
BMS sales representatives in the most productive areas of the United States, based on analysis of prescriber profiles. In geographic areas where both companies have sales representatives, reasonable efforts will be made to split the sales targets as
equitably as possible. Both BMS and Otsuka sales representatives will be assigned to cover economically valuable accounts, including without limitation (and as an amendment to Section 5.3.5 of the Restated Agreement), teaching hospitals and
influential medical centers, military/veteran accounts, long-term care and prisons. Furthermore (and as a further amendment to Section 5.3.5 of the Restated Agreement), (1) Otsuka account executives may continue to call on managed care organizations
and government agencies in tandem with BMS account executives, and (2) subsequent to June&nbsp;30, 2014, Otsuka account executives may independently call on managed care organizations and government agencies, unless such calls are inconsistent with
an agreed Annual Commercial Plan.</FONT></P> <P STYLE="font-size:6px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">The Parties shall prepare and implement a [*] Plan in
accordance with Paragraph 7(d) of this Amendment.</FONT></P> <P STYLE="font-size:6px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:1px">&nbsp;</P></TD></TR>
<TR>
<TD VALIGN="top" STYLE="BORDER-LEFT:1px solid #000000; BORDER-BOTTOM:1px solid #000000; padding-left:8px"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>Co-Promotion Agreement</B></FONT></TD>
<TD VALIGN="bottom" STYLE="BORDER-LEFT:1px solid #000000; BORDER-BOTTOM:1px solid #000000"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD VALIGN="top" STYLE="BORDER-RIGHT:1px solid #000000; BORDER-BOTTOM:1px solid #000000; padding-right:8px"> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">The Co-Promotion Agreement will be negotiated within one
hundred twenty (120) days subsequent to the Amendment Effective Date. The Co-Promotion agreement shall be limited to Commercialization in the U.S. and shall be consistent with the Amendment, including this Exhibit 3.</FONT></P> <P
STYLE="font-size:6px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">In the Co-Promotion Agreement, the Parties shall jointly discuss and agree upon detailing thresholds,
the cost of each detail (or of FTEs based on details per FTE) for purposes of determining Operational Expenses, and shortfall provisions (<I>e.g.</I>, the target number of detailing and allocation thereof between the Parties and specific remedies in
case of shortfall of the allocated PDEs by a Party, etc.). Otsuka shall adopt reasonable measures of sales performance consistent with BMS&#146; internal company metrics, and the Parties shall agree on</FONT></P> <P
STYLE="font-size:6px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:1px">&nbsp;</P></TD></TR>
</TABLE> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P>

COMMISSION </FONT></P>

SIZE="2">a method of communication with respect to sales performance results.</FONT></P> <P STYLE="font-size:6px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:1px">&nbsp;</P></TD></TR>
<TR>
<TD VALIGN="top" STYLE="BORDER-LEFT:1px solid #000000; BORDER-BOTTOM:1px solid #000000; padding-left:8px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></TD>

<TD VALIGN="top" STYLE="BORDER-RIGHT:1px solid #000000; BORDER-BOTTOM:1px solid #000000; padding-right:8px"> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">The allocation of PDEs shall be consistent with each
Party&#146;s Standard Efforts commitment as set forth in the Annual Commercial Plan (consistent with Paragraph 7 of the Amendment.)</FONT></P> <P STYLE="font-size:6px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P> <P
STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">The Co-Promotion Agreement shall also set forth how each Party&#146;s annual PDE requirements shall be allocated on a quarterly basis (the <B>&#147;Quarterly
PDE/Detailing Amount&#148;</B>) and, in the event a Party delivers in excess of [*] of such Party&#146;s Quarterly PDE/Detailing Amount for a particular Quarter, then the number of such Party&#146;s PDEs in excess of such [*] threshold shall be
excluded from the calculation in determining if a Party&#146;s obligations have been met with respect to such Party&#146;s PDE requirements under the Co-Promotion Agreement.</FONT></P> <P
STYLE="font-size:6px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:1px">&nbsp;</P></TD></TR>
<TR>
<TD VALIGN="top" STYLE="BORDER-LEFT:1px solid #000000; BORDER-BOTTOM:1px solid #000000; padding-left:8px"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>Breach</B></FONT></TD>
<TD VALIGN="bottom" STYLE="BORDER-LEFT:1px solid #000000; BORDER-BOTTOM:1px solid #000000"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD VALIGN="top" STYLE="BORDER-RIGHT:1px solid #000000; BORDER-BOTTOM:1px solid #000000; padding-right:8px"> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">The Parties shall jointly discuss and agree upon standards
and consequences for either Party&#146;s failure to provide its respective share of Standard Efforts during any quarter or year, including, e.g., obligations to deliver PDE shortfall in a given quarter or year, and financial remedies tied to
deficits (with increased penalties in the case of a severe or repeated failure), which shall be set forth in the definitive Co-Promotion Agreement.</FONT></P> <P STYLE="font-size:6px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:1px">&nbsp;</P></TD></TR>
